102a6(mdo): bung ba stag ris 'phur zhing sgra snyan sgrogs pa dag/ ldum pog chad du bskyab shing sbrang rtsi tshogs kyang 'dzugs// nges par srid bu'i rigs myin gnod sbyin klu la stsogs// gang la bskal pa yod dkur 'khor zhing bsnyed bkur bgyid
102a7(mdo): khyod las chos kyi me tog bdud rtsi'i khu mnos shing // bdag dang gzhan gi ched la tshogs gnyis brtson par stsogs// de dag rgyal ba'i byed brla nyi #/ la la rdzu 'phrul spyod lam mdzes kyis 'dul bar byed/ 
102a8(mdo): bar par sems can don byar chos ston sgra yang 'byir// sun kyang mtha' du bla myed sa mchogazab par 'gyur// yo bang ldem po mi le'u bye bzhi pa'o// / khyod kyi sgra zhi ga ni tu dpe' legs/ 
102b1(mdo): mdog kyang gsal// gzi brjid che mnga' yid 'ong blta bas ngoms myi myong // sha rus gzugs 'dra ba ma'i rgyu las byung ba byin// thabs mkhas dam pa yab yin shes rab chen po yum// pha rol phyind mchog byams pa'i rig+sa/ 
102b2(mdo): las byung bas na// cis 'dul sna tshogs mchog gi sku ston bsam myi khyab// bshos bu 'brul stsogs pa'i zas la gsol ma lags// smon lam rnam par dag pas yongs su sgrub pa'i sku skyes bu dam pa'i mtshan mchog
102b3(mdo): rdzogs par mnga' ba ya// dpe' byad bzang po brgya cus mdzes par brgyan pas na// 'khor los sgyur pa'i lus la 'tshang ba'i mtshan rnams las// shin tu gsal zhing legs par grub par 'phags pa gda'// dka' thub brtul
102b4(mdo): zhugs bskal pa bsam yas dpag 'das su// 'gro la phan phyir khyod kyis yongs su mdzad pas na// mtshan ldan zhabs gnyis shi nad tu brtan par gnas pa ste// 'jam zhing sdug pa pad mo'i mdog ltar yid
102b5(mdo): 'od grub// 'khor ba'i 'jigs pas nyen pa'i 'gro ba skyabs chol rnams// myi 'jigs skyabs kyis bskyabs shes 'gon mdzad bsrungs pas ma// dga' ba 'khyil dang 'khor lo dpal ma hA
102b6(mdo): gyi rnams// zhabs kyi 'thil la dpel legs shi nad tu mdzes par grub// spyod pa'i dam pa'i bsdu bas tus rnams thams cad du// khyod kyis 'gro ba phongs pa dkal dang bde ba'i dod// rdzogs par mdzad pa 'i 'ong legs/ 
102b7(mdo): grub pa yis// phyag dang zhabs so dra bar 'brel pa mchog tu gyur// thugs je chen po yang la bas phyag rir bus mo 'das// byams pa rgyas pa mnga' bas sku mdog gser ka 'dra// yo byad thams cad btang bas rnam pa bdun
102b8(mdo): mchog/ stes gangs da bad pags pa sa// byen ca rgyas pa gsungs pa chom sa thug pa'i brtsa pa// bde gshesas tan 'bang bstan pas kya ma pa sa
103a1(mdo): gsas brjod pas sngags ni che zhing yangs// dpe cang pata rdzogs smra mchog pa las phyag kyang 'tsham// rgya chen thams cad gi le'u gyi sa pa'o// 
103a2(mdo): 'khor los sbyar ba'i rgyal po gleng bzhi 'ini dbang byed pa// dge bcu las lam sngon che gus par spyad pa'i mthus// rin chen bdun la spyod pa'i 'jig rten mthu mchog thob// nye ba'i rin chen bdun po de dag rkyed du grur/ 
103a3(mdo): gseng gi 'khor lo de sring bzhi'i dbang byed dang // glang po cang shes pa la kar yon tan yang ldan gnyis// rta mchog rin chen dkar po bgrod dgu pa mgyogs pa dang // bud byed rin chen yid 'ong yon tan 'grangs dang
103a4(mdo): ka'i// dang bu rin chen thung brgyad 'od mchog ldan pa dang // khyim dag na can dgapa dbu rgya dad pas 'bul bas drug/ blod pa na ca ma rlom yid bzhin bsgrub par bajun// 
103a5(mdo): dedag kyi na pas kyad rgya#dzi cemams da / nyi ma pam ra#
103a6(mdo): yid 'ong dam pa dang / 'dod pa lnga ldan nags tshal mdangs dga'i gnas dang bzhi// nye bzhi na chen khyim rab mad chos ldan pa dang // gos mchog sa/ sa su ma btags pazhis yang dag drug/ 
103a7(mdo): nye ba'i ra re chen lham mchog dpag tshad brgyad 'gros bdun// yo byad mkho pa de dag nye bar long spyod rkyen// 'phags pa myi 'pham dka' ldan chos kyis 'khor lo rje// bdud bzhi btul zhing kun las rgyal ba 'gro ba'i tshe// 
103a8(mdo): nor gyi 'khor lo rje ltar nyon mongs ldan ma lags// 'byung ba gsum na rgyal por brjod dgu dper myi bzod// rin chen mchog mang la brgyan las 'khor lo ri na phul// byang chub 'tshang rgyar gzhol pa d+ma
103b1(mdo): dge chos 'khor lo ste// nam mkhal pa zas gtugs thogs rnams yongs su dbang sbyar bapa// gling bzhi dbang byed gser gi 'khor lo dper gyi bzod// rin chen glang por mngalab mnyam byed theg pa cig// gti mug
103b2(mdo): mdongs pas man pas mkha dgu rtog pa'i rgya// theg pa de la rigs bzhi skyes bu brtan par gzhog/ glang po cang shes thal kar dam pa dper gyi bzod// rin chen rta bong so so yang dag rig pa mngal// 'gro ba zha
103b3(mdo): yod thogs myed pa'i gnas su skyel// bgrod dka'i chos lam bgrod la mthu che mgyogs pa ste// rta mchog dkar po mgyogs pa de la dper gyi bzod// rin chen btsun mo'i mchog tu khyod la dpal ma par ste// yid
103b4(mdo): tu 'ong dgu'i bde ba ma lus 'phral tu sgrub// sems can kun la byang chub dam pa'i bdel ba stobs// bud myed rin chen yon tan bgrangs pa dper myi bzod// rin chen nor bu dam pa sna
103b5(mdo): khyim bdag tu ni chos kyi spyan mnga' ste// de bzhin gshegs kyi snying po gter na 'chang ba gzigs// snga bur dri mas yog pa ma lus yongs su skyongs// dpag tshad khor yug nong gi gtes mtho dper gyi bzod // 
103b6(mdo): rin cher blon zer khyod pa byin brlab sa mchog sapa ste// ci dang ci bzhed de dang de dag sa nyes par 'thal// rgya me yangs pas bsas pa'i spyod yus kun las 'das phyogs cin tu tsho dod thu bablon po dbang kyi
103b7(mdo): bzang// rin chen ngas myos dzin rten kyi man sa ba sa/ byan ldan gyi nas su kyi nga nga ma// tshig pa tshas pa'i gas pa da rig sa// gan sa na das kyis
104a1(mdo): rgya bathod// rin chen bags pa mi ma 'khri mig sang ba ni bsdams// ta chen nang chug mo bdag du ring phyogs tshogs 'argyas// me dang tu yis 'dzin ci'am nyings nas des kyi zad// bras nas/ 
104a2(mdo): yun ridag zod mchis gas ngagi tshul tu dgal// drang srong btul zhugs la canasang rtag tu sa rnams gra dad pa// bkas pa'i son tan mangs chags shing sred sa gas// spyod ldan dang dang ri dgas dge'akhamams nga
104a3(mdo): srad du// sron las bsod nams 'bras bu che bsgrub gzhan don mdzad// g.yas du g.yas su 'chus pa dgel bsrung mchog kyi dpeng// g.yon du g.yon du 'chus pa myi dge la spangs kyi tshul// rgyab spang sdug dag nyin mas
104a4(mdo): rgyab tu bor ba'i mtshan// lto dkar gsal ba rnam byang mdun du blangs/ kyi rtags// ring lon ma rnyings byang chub sems bskyed myi bzod// tshul// / 'go 'jug chang ba dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs pa'i
104a5(mdo): dpel// byol song gcig gi phyir yang pags pa rtag bsnams ma// skye bo gzhan gi don la brtson pa smon ci 'tshal// khyod ni dgel tshig tshad myed sa'i dam pa ste// mgon po bsod nams zhing la phul pi
104a6(mdo): dge' ba'i rtsa ba ni// pags pa'i spya dbacul rnyed ri dgas de la 'phel// gzhan gyi rin chen pags pa gas kyi dper mi bzod// rin che pal du 'dzind pas dbyes pa'i bsam gtan mngal// gzung ba'i yul du gyur
104a7(mdo): dgus de la bskyon gyi nus// g.yeng dang 'khrug pa'i gnod myed shi nad tu bde la 'jam// gzhan gi rin chen ma la mchog shas kyi dper myi bzod// rin chen nags chal tu ni mthar gyis dgu spyod mngal// nyon mong/ 
104a8(mdo): gdung myed bde dga'i grib ma dbyen dang ldan// dge' tshogs bsod nams kyis grub pa brjod myi lang // gzhan gi rin chen nags tshal shas kyi dper myi bzod// rin chen khyim tu 'jig rten 'das chos yang rtog
104b1(mdo): mngang // nam par sel pa gsum po mchog gi zho dang ldan// chos kyi gzhal byed khang pa spyod bral phun sum tshogs// gzhan gi de ni khyim gyi nas kyi dper myi bzod// rin chen gos su mnabs pa mang
104b2(mdo): gnas ris kyi tshul// mtshon bzang dpel legs 'cha dang s+ya bya'i mdongs lhag/ lha rdzas gos mchog bzang stug lha la srid drang gi de 'a legs mdzes pa rgya gdas phal la byed// nges par kos myin man
104b3(mdo): thabs kyis bslabs pa ni// khre ltas chu gang bang mdzod gzhadang la rnam par 'gebs// chos kyi yon rgyas pa la sku la nga bzang gdal// gzhan gyi rin chen gos ni shes kyi dper gyi bzod// rin chen
104b4(mdo): bu mkhyed du dpa gang ldan mchog yang la ste// 'jig rten khyod na spyod kyang 'khab pa ma dmar gyi 'bying // gar bzod kyi bzhed de bzhin thogs pa myed par gro// gzhan gyi
104b5(mdo): chen sum yigs kyi dbes kyi bzod// khyod kyi phyag na ris pa gnas mdog bsnam pa ni// spu mug dbyibs len/ nang gi bcud dang ldan pa de// mthong dgra 'chags pa mi
104b6(mdo): khams gsum kun na byed// byang chub dam pa'i rdzas te 'gon po khyod la mngal// de ni rin chen byed du rgya ltang gsal pa la// gang gi rkyen dang phrad pa de bzhin kha dog 'gyur// chu ni btud rtsi'i khru ga
104b7(mdo): phan bde mang byed pa// 'jam zhing zhim pa bsil dang ngoms pas yongs su gang // rin chen rgyu sgrub snod ltar snang ba ril ba myin// gzungs mchog rang bzhin dri ma myed pa snod ltar snang // phyims
104b8(mdo): kyi brlabs chen kun la snyoms pa'i rgyas gang sa// yongs su btang yang rtag tu 'phel zhing tun myo chang // khams gsum nyon mongs kyi ba ba rnam par 'bar ba la// chos tu 'asam pas kun
105a1(mdo): rab tu zhi mdzad pa// zhe sdang gtum khas 'khrug pa'i 'gro ba brlang pa dag/ khyod kyi byams pa'i chus pa rlan 'jam par 'gyur// gti mug thibs po'i rdul gyis yongs su yog pa'i// 'ams sum
105a2(mdo): ngan pa'i bzlog pa'i lam yang de yin te// khyod kyi thugs kyis sbyangs pa'i dri myed chus bkrus nas// kun kyang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhin du dag par 'gyur// myi zad yon tan gzungs kyi rnam pa mngal ba
105a3(mdo): dang // byams pa yun rings dus su myi bzang bsgoms pa gnyis// ril ba chus gang phyag na bsdams par gdal ba yang // yon tan med kyi chos las 'jig rten chos su sprul// dpal ldan klu shi
105a4(mdo): bsdams pa sman gyi dam pa ste// rtag tu myi skam yal ka cha zhing rnam par mdzes// gang skyes nas byang tus tshong dus dang tshul spyor te// mngon par 'chang rgya'i chen rdo rje'i brtan du skyes// me
105a5(mdo): tog mu tig gzer gi ze ba bzang dang ldan// lcug ma gnyen 'jab sa/ chen as ma kar bas byas// rin chen shel sdong gsal zhing / 'jam pa dpag bsams shing // lu ma mus gar ba bsil
105a6(mdo): dga' grib dang ldan// shind tu bzang legs kun gyis bsngags shing brjod pa'i gnas// bsod nams rgyas pa'i 'bras bu mdog stug ro zhim ldan// 'od zer rnam pa sna tshogs de las kun tu 'phro// 
105a7(mdo): yid dam smon lam dngos po 'bras bur mngon gyur kyang // 'jig rten yid dang sbyor zhing gang ga'i lhar myi skye// nges par klu shing ma yin khyod kyi yon tan tshogs// sdug bsngal nad kyis gzing ba kun la sam du
105a8(mdo): 'gyur// skye bo bde bas phongs pa bsod nams yid bzhin thob// ci las cing sprul mngon par 'chang rgya'i shi tu bstan// dpal gnas bsam gyis myi khyab rin chen mdzes// mchod rten dbu la bsnams
105b1(mdo): pa khri 'phang stegs kyi gzhi// bar rim mtho zhing legs drang bsngags pas brjod du 'os// rin chen them skas mnyam myed yid du 'ong dang ldan// phreng pa khor yug mchod rten rkyen du 'byor cing mdzes// 'phar
105b2(mdo): mapo zur phyin mdog 'tsher 'od kyis rab tu gsal// bum pa skyon byed dbyibs legs shind tu brjod par grub// 'od 'phro 'jig rten bsam pa'i mos pa rgya chen skyed// pu shu zur phyin mkhos stug yon tan
105b3(mdo): 'phags dang ldan// srog shing dpel legs rtsa ba shi nad tu bstand pa la// gdugs kyi 'breng ba bzang zhing legs par bres dang ldan// steng gi char khab yangs pa gnas la sprin ltar lding // sku gtungabar byis
105b4(mdo): bcas kun kyis rim gror mchod cing bkur // gzhi rten stegs bu rim chen rdo rje mchog las blangs// khri 'phang rin chen seng ge dpa mchog rgya las bsgrubs// ngos bzhi them skas rin chen 'gro ba/ 
105b5(mdo): snang bar byed// 'phreng ba 'gab 'khor rin chen 'jig rten rgyal bas byas// bum pa rgyas pa yid bzhin rin chen 'od las grub// steng gi pu chu rin chen dpe' byed besam gyi khyab// dbus kyi srog zhi
105b6(mdo): brtan gser dpal 'bar bsgrubs// gdugs 'phye ba rnam par brtsegs pa kun tu khyab par snang // char khab bla lding rin chen nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan mchog/ yan lag thams cad de ltar lha rin ce na// rang byung
105b7(mdo): bzod bcos ma yin yon tan rmad kyi mchogs// de na pade gshegs ring bsel rdzu 'phrul che bzhugs pa// bdag nyid che ldan leklas pa'i tshogs kyi mthu mngal bas// bar bar nas dag gsal pa'i 'od/ 
105b8(mdo): zer mang po 'gyed// 'jig rten gsum gyis srog mun nag rab tu sel// mchod rten nges myin bsams yas dbyibs nyid mkhyend pa yin// don gyi dpa pa bcos nyid bkur stir dbu la bsdams// chos
106a1(mdo): nyi gzugs med sprul pa mchod rten dbyibs su bsgrung // snong byed dngos las 'dul ba'i dbang tu smos te bstan// dge bcu las kyis pa ni rmad kyi stegs bu byas// skyon byed yang dag 'dod masapa dge 'drang na/ 
106a2(mdo): bar grub / reg pa gsum po zhe 'amang rim pa sna bung lding // rnam par gsum ga stabs bcas byang chub rten kyang byed// rnam pang brgyad po ris kyi yangam smras su bcas// bsgribs pa kun las par byed
106a3(mdo): rten 'dapar bzod/ gcos de yan lag bcu gnyis 'bab kyi 'greng bar byas// chos kyi 'khor lo ba bcad zhabs byed rgyun tu 'khor// chos dbyings spong myed dbum pa zlum po'i tshul du snga pa// yang dag gnyis
106a4(mdo): bu byed pa yid bzhin kun 'byung rgya// bu Ta m+ba bzhi cad myed kyimathas dpapa ste// gzugs med brjod 'das gaT+Ta/ dab cig tu sprul pa yis// mag gang brtan 'gas
106a5(mdo): rtsod lam chen po'i dru/ yin pa drag pas legs pa'i rgya sa/ gzha byar bta// zugs sde chen ma gtun ma byangs cang gebs // grags rje chen po'i sa gyingam pa gebs pa yang / 
106a6(mdo): 'tho ba kun la nyi ma byed pas khyad par byag// zag byed chos mchog cha 'ab babang de zhwa lding bus// bcings mol laya gnyis byed pas pa byed bde ba'i gnas// dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa sungs
106a7(mdo): tshul sprul te// 'jig rten mun pa 'od snga mkhyend pa yangs pas bsal// skye gnas bzhi por skye ba'i 'gro ba thams cad la// khyen nyid chos kyi rjes mdzad mchod rten tshul gyur pas// 'phags pa chang chog
106a8(mdo): kun kyang rdzogs par yongs subasdus te// sprul cing mtshan mar bsnams la gus par phyag kyang 'tshal// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i le'u ste drug pa'o// 
106b1(mdo): nam mkha' yal las char papa nyi sa 'ang shang kyang dan// 'ja dang mkha' gnyis mtshon bzang sna tshogs 'phel ba snang // sku suka mdzes lham de la dga' zhing rtog pa 'byung // nad ka yams kyi lhas snyam 'jigs
106b2(mdo): shing dogs pa'ang skyes// tu rim spel ba bsrings na sba zhing mdzes par snang // bsnyen na bltar yod tsam las zhe ste/ zung du myed// shes rab ldan pas mthong na rang bzhin nges par rtogs// byis pa rmen pa
106b3(mdo): rnams ni de la chongs zhing zhed// khyod kyi thugs je 'jig rten sdod kyang nga ldar pad// 'dus byas chos kyis rol cing sna tshogs ston mdzad pa// de dag yon tam mchog snyam dga' zhing mos la'ang 'thung // bdun
106b4(mdo): ris stongs par slu snyam 'jig zhid dogs pa'ang skye// rkyen 'dus gzhan dbang byang ba rnam par makra gsal pa// rigs pas bta na la phab mdongs khyed sgyu ma bzhid// ye shes mchog gi spyan
106b5(mdo): kyis chos kun 'ja 'drar gzigs// byis pa myi shes rmongs kyang the tsom bsal cing gcod// thogs myed mkhye nad gsal de / 'dra phul mnga' ba// 'ja dang 'dra ba'i las dper pa sbyar/ 
106b6(mdo): snyam na// chos kun 'ja 'drar ston pas sems can sgrol gyis lhag// 'dra ba'i dper bra dpel zla myed pas khyod la bstod// lang dang mkha'i dpe'i le'u ste brgyan pa'o// 
106b7(mdo): ram mkha' stong la char sprin lhun sdug tshogs 'chas na// 'brug sla brjid grag klog gi 'phreng pa mang po 'byung // ro gcig char khrus rab 'brib sa ma'i shi rtsi bskyed// tshul 'dul dkon pa kun kyang mdan/ 
106b8(mdo): sdug rdul gyi ldang // rang bzhin stong la yon tan sprin gyi tshogs 'chas pa// chos kyi 'brug sgra spobs pa'i glog 'phreng myur ba ston// theg pa gcig las byang chub ga ma 'os rim par bkod// nyon mongs
107a1(mdo): dgon pa'i tshul pa nang nas kyang nyes kyi yang// yon tan sur rtabs ched 'jig rten granas pa 'phags pa'i sbyor// 'grob sna tshogs dbang po'i rjes su mthong badzad cig// dus gsum tsham ma thas/ 
107a2(mdo): sa rgyas se skye pa/ skye ba sa phrag da / gas ma #
107a3(mdo): snyems pas mthol ba'i rtse monal tu bsnyams// nag po bdudad kyi phyogs kyang byang chub gangs su bskyed// rig pa'i chu bskyed 'gro ba bsod nams zhing tu 'gyur// mthul stobs tshad myed ce
107a4(mdo): pa'i kha ba ser bab pa// bsngo zhing brgyal gyis thub myed rma kyi mthus 'dul zhing // 'gro ba rigs dma' kun la 'phag sa pa'i brjid kyis bstabs// brtas gnas mchod pa'i sa
107a5(mdo): sbyar la phyag kyang 'chal// rnam par ma da pa gangs bskyed pa'i la'u sto gu 'tsho// gseng ge lo 'phags pa bdun ngom 'khor ba dang // yan lag brgyad ldan chu po rim par la gyi/ 
107a6(mdo): rin kyi rnams phyis can 'thun na bcu yod kyi// so song bsngos mtsho na kyad po ngas pa mang // de bzhin tshad kyi myang chub phyogs kyi chos rnamapa dang // 'phags sam rnas
107a7(mdo): dag pa yan lag brgyad po rnams// de dag spyir brjod byang chub phyogs su 'dra ba ste// gzhan gi spyod dang myi mnyam khyad zhugs rnam pa mang // ri bo tus 'dzin mdangs 'bar nye bar gnas pa ni/ 
107b1(mdo): ros bzhi dri myed gsal bar phyogs rnams kun tu sdang // lhun sdug mdzes pa'i yon tan brjod pa kar yang grags// phyi nang dag dgas sribs par gyi skang mtho legs dang ldan// dran pa nyer bzhag rnam/ 
107b2(mdo): par byang ba'i tshul brtags na// lus 'di myi gcang dngos kyang chos su gtsang ma'i nyer// dngos nyid phyi rtag legs kyang dkon mchog gdung sob btaka/ kun rdzob don dpa rnam pa tu yang thugs su chud// chos
107b3(mdo): drad nyer banas pa de dang drug bsngal gnyis byin la// 'dod cags zhe sdang gti mug rang bzhin rnam pa mkhyen/ 'on tung nas na mchong sems cad thugs rjes bzung ba nyin cho// bdag dang gzhan
107b4(mdo): gi nyon mongs sna tshogs yongs su spong // sems kyi dran pa nyer shig yang dag tshul brtan pas// 'gro ba kun gyi phyi dang dmyigs sems yongs su mkhyen// thugs rje bro tshul
107b5(mdo): bzhin kun la so sor skye// 'on kyang de la myi gnas bye braga'abyed myi mngal// chos kyi dran pa nye bar bzhag pas dngos po rnams// stong pa nyid chos kyi dbyings dang myi gnyis
107b6(mdo): thugs chud pas// rnam pa thams cad ma lus mkhyen pas rtog pa myed// sems cad kun don mdzad kyang chos nyid 'tshams kyi 'das// sngon gyi spong lam mthu ldan dran pa nye por gzhan
107b7(mdo): bzhis// log pa rnam bzhi ngan lta kun ni yongs su sbyangs// rnam tog mtshan mar 'dzin pa ma lus bsal cing por// spyod pa rgya chen sna tshogs chub par yongs su dag/ khyod kyi yon tan
107b8(mdo): tshogs chen mnga' ba de dag la// mthun pa'i tshul las dran te dper thang bstod snyam la// myi mnyam mnyam la dpel lus 'das byas brjod du myed// 'on kya nga das kyis brtags pa dpe
108a1(mdo): gang nas ma bstod// gos 'dzin po rgyas sa pa myong btags pa// skyon byed dbyibs legs mdzes pa mthong gus pa sngags pa/ kye zag nas pa phyogs pazhin/ 
108a2(mdo): nas rgyas par bres// skyes dang 'bying gi gnod pa kun srong rgyas tu gnas// yang dag slong ba myong dang yon tan 'thun pa ste// myi dge go bkag dge chos spes pas kun tu bzung // tshul khrims te
108a3(mdo): 'dzin shes rab rnam grol yongs su rdzogs// rnal 'byor de dam pa rtag tu 'khrul myed bsgrim gyi 'tshal// myi dge 'byung ba ma skyes kyi 'gag tshul mkhyend pa// 'dod chags khong khro gti mug dri ma yongs
108a4(mdo): su bsal// tus gsum ma lus mnyam pa nyid tu mngon gsum phyir// 'das dang ma 'ongs da ltar byung la ye shes 'jug/ dge chos ma skyes bskyed pa'i don tu thugs bskyed pas/ 
108a5(mdo): yang dag sgrub pa'i dge ma spyon byed brtan par bcugs/ byang chub gsub tu 'gro ba ma lus dgod srang cu// dge chos yang gi bskyed ces rnam par dgongs pa mdzad// dge tshos byes
108a6(mdo): pa myi mnyam rgya cher spel skyes pas// khams gsum spyod yul kun las 'das pa'i bsod nams tshogs// bdag dang gzhan don rgya che grangs myed 'grub pa'i rgyu// byang chub snying po'i mtha' du rtsa
108a7(mdo): kya bam la 'ams// yang dag slong zan spobs kyis kyi dge sangs bkag cig// dge byed btan par mngad pas chos 'di ma ngon tu 'byung // sngon gi spyod pa mtha' mas yongs su dag pa'i chung // 
108a8(mdo): tan ma mdzad de bzhin yun gyis grub par 'byung // khyod kyi yon tam tshogs chen mngal ba de dag la// mthun pa'i rgyal las dras te dper thang ba nyid snyam sa// phyi mnyam mnyam pa dpe' las 'das pa bajos
108b1(mdo): tu byed// 'on kyang nan gyis brtags pa'i dper blang 'ol tsam bstod// ser ldeng ri po phyogs bzhi shar nub ngos dang gnyis lho dang byang du lta ba'i ngos gnyis bgrangs par bzhi// seng ldeng sdong rings nags
108b2(mdo): byug ma bzang yid du 'ong // so ma grib chen gdung ba spong ba'i 'dab ma yang // rdzu 'phrul rkang bzhi mos dang brtson 'grus 'bar dang gnyis sems dang dpyod pa 'du byed stong dang ldan par bzhi// byang chub
108b3(mdo): sems dbasams dge ldan mos pa'i rkang pa yang // myi dge chos spod brtson 'grub rgya 5// thugs rje chen po mngal sems su 'phrul rkang pa yang // thabs mkhas tshul 'tshang dpyod pa'i rdzu 'phrul rkang pa
108b4(mdo): yang // rdzu 'phrul rnams yang dag zugs chung rdzogs stobs pa// bde gshegs lags bzhin lung bstan das la de ltar bzhugs// dad pa mchog gis mngon shes lnga rnams mngon tu mdzad// ban/ 
108b5(mdo): 'grus mchog gis yon tan grangs myed mngon tu bsgrubs// se mas kyi mchog gis ma yus chos rnams yongs su brtags/ dpyod pa mchog gis bde gshegs chos la mkhas pa bsgrubs/ 
108b6(mdo): byams dang snying rje dga' ba btang snyoms tshad myed bzhi// de dag rdzu 'phrul kang pa bzhi'i gnas dang rgyu yin te// bsam gtan ting 'dzin mnyam gzhag mang po kun la rol// lus dang sems kyi bag yangs yon/ 
108b7(mdo): tan chen po brnyes// khyod kyi yon tan tshogs chen mnga' ba de dag la// 'thun pa'i tshul las drangs te dper blang bstod snyam na// myi mnyam mnyam pa dpe las 'das pas brjod du myed// 'on kyang nan gyis brtag/ 
108b8(mdo): pa'i dper blang 'ol tsam bstod// mdzes snang ri po ngos bzhi shar nub blta la dga' dang // lho byang gnyis kyang ngos kyis phyi pA Sha dad de// mthong dka'i rgyas du 'dra bas khyad myed bzhi po ni// seng ldeng ri bo'i sdong
109a1(mdo): rings grib kyis slebs dang lnga// dbang po lnga mang la dang dang brtson 'grus 'bar ba gnyis// dran dang ting 'dzid shes rab bsal bas rnam pa lnga// dad pas byang chub spyod bsdus de nyid
109a2(mdo): brtson pas bsgrubs// dran pa'i dbang pos legs pa de dag chud pa stsal// ting 'dzind dbang pos chos rab de dag rtse gcig bzung // shes rab dbang pos sa rab de dag rtse gcig bzang // shes rab ngam
109a3(mdo): de dag shi nang tu rtogs par mkhyend// dbang po de dag ldan zhing rjes su 'brel pas na// sems can kun gyi don gnyer phan bde bsgrub slad du// dbang po lnga rnams de 'dra yon tan 'phags pa mngal// 'jig
109a4(mdo): rten ma btab 'jig rtend 'das pa'i dbang pos rol// phal gyis myi 'dus gzhan gyis yongs su dkra myi 'tshal// pha rol// da po'i dmyigs mkhas myi zad byang chub sems myi stonang // 
109a5(mdo): dbang po lnga mthus dus gsum srid pa thams cad du// gzhan gyi rnyog bsal rang gi dri ma rnam par spangs khyod kyi yon tan cho ga chen mnga' ba de dag la// mthun pa'i tshul las dran te dper
109a6(mdo): blang bstod snyam na// myi mnyam mnyam pa dpe' las 'das pa brjod du myed// 'on kyang nan gyis brtags pa'i dper blang 'ol tsam bstod// rta rna ri po yan lag ngos bzhi bgrangs pa dang // seng ldeng
109a7(mdo): ri bo sdong rangs grib kyis slebs dang 'dra// gzar mkhrang rna bzhin myi nyan yun du brtan pa ste// dbyibs legs sra ba'i yon tan 'chang pas rtse gyi til// de bzhin khyod la stobs mchog lnga po mnga' ba ni/ 
109a8(mdo): dad pa'i stobs dang brtson 'grus dam pa brtan pas gnyis// dran pa'i stobs dang ting 'dzi nad stobs dang bzhi// shes rab gsal ba thogs byed stobs kyi mchog lnga// dad pa'i stobs mnga' bdud kyi dpung / 
109b1(mdo): kis sku myi nus// brtson 'grus stobs pang la brtul la gzhan gyis bskyed kyi bskul// dram pa'i stobs mang la nyon mongs chos kyis bar myi chod// ting 'dzin stobs snga rnal 'byor nga skyon kyis gzhar myi 'thug+sas/ 
109b2(mdo): shes rab stobs mngal mkhas pa'i phul byang thub pa myed// stobs mchog lnga po de dag rdzogs par mnga' bas ni// log pa'i phyogs kyis myi 'phrogs bzhed dgu rang la 'phongs// lha dang lha myin 'jig rten
109b3(mdo): bcas pas bskyed du byed// myi bgyi myi mdzad bgyi ba thams cad chub par mdzad// mdzad du don mchis yul gyi rnam pa ma myi 'byung // nam grol stobs rdzogs the tshom dri ma yongs su bsal// theg pa
109b4(mdo): gzhan gyis myi 'dus theg pa chen por brtag/ khyod kyi yon tan tshogs chen mnga' ba de dag la// mthun pa'i tshul las dran te dper blang bstod snyam na// myi mnyam mnyam pa dpe las
109b5(mdo): 'das pa brjod du myed// 'on kyang nan gyis brtags pa'i dperablang 'ol tsam bstod// mu 'dzin ri po mu ni spyi mtshan myi// nga du brjod// 'dzin ni yan lag rnam pa so so bgrangs pa
109b6(mdo): brdal// ngos bzhi de las gcig phyung spyir btang ngos gsum po// rnam btud steng bsnan stobs te cha bgrangs bdun du 'gyur// rnam btud de'i spo mthon rtse mo du ma yang // ri rab dbus nas skyes
109b7(mdo): la kun kyis gus par btud// rin chen gser gyi ri yang snyen bkun kus byed na// gling gzhi gzhan gyi ri rnams myi gus gang zhig 'byung // sa 'dzi nad ri bo logs gcig phyog gan // gser gyi ri bo thams
109b8(mdo): cad las dang mdog mthun pas// sa'i sgra dang sbyar te spyi mtshan mying tu bya// lhag pa 'dzin gyi slar sbyar yan lag don tu bstan// byang chub yan lag bdud ni dran dang chos 'byed gnyis// brtson 'grus
110a1(mdo): dgal ba ting 'dzidad dag pas drug/ btang snyoms deng gtogs byang chub yan lag de ltar btud// 'di ni rnam pa kun tu spyad pa'i mthu yang yin// tshul khrims ting 'dzin na ma thos phung po dang / 
110a2(mdo): rnam par grol ba'i ye zhes mthong ba'i phung po rnams// byang dub dgongs pa na sa yang nyams par gyi 'byung bas// chos kun rnam par 'byed pa thugs su chud pas btes// sems cad yongs su smin par mdzan
110a3(mdo): la sbyor myi 'gyur// chos kyi dka' la rnam dag dgel bas rnam par rol// dga' bde 'don la 'gro ba thams cad 'jog cing stobs// ting 'dzin myi g.yo gcig bzhugs spyod pa sna tshogs mdzad// bgyi ba'i
110a4(mdo): rnam pa ma lus bgyis pa nyid du gyur pa// rnam grol snying po 'ang gas pas bsngags pa grub cing rdzogs// sku gsum mtshan ldan bde gshegs che ba nyid du gyur pa// chos kyi longs spyod rdzogs pa/ 
110a5(mdo): sgyid la rnam par ro la// khyod kyi yon tan tshogs chen mnga' pa de dag la// mthun pa'i tshul dris dper blang bstod pa ni// myi mnyam mnyam pa dpel las 'das pas brjod du
110a6(mdo): myed// 'on kyang nan gyis brtags pa'i dper blang skad kyis bstod// gser ri de dag phrag na chu mchog yon tan can// yan lag brgyad dang ldan par mtshungs pa'i legs brjod na// grang ste bsil pa/ 
110a7(mdo): cha ba'i gtung ba yongs su sel// sgom pas nyen pa ngoms shing bde bas tshim par byed// yangs te 'ju sla bgra dang rtsar mgyogs bde ba'i rgyu// yon tan lngas reg lus kyi dbang po dga' ba'i rkyen// 
110a8(mdo): zhim pa'i ro mchog kha bsnying nga pa gang yang myed// ro zhim de myangs lce'i dbang po dga' zhing bde// 'jam la mnyen pas 'gengs dang rtsub pa'i dngos myi 'byung // mdangs bzangs le mdog bzab
110b1(mdo): dril pa'i rgyur yang 'gyur// dang pas gtsang zhing mdog ngan rnyog pa de la myed// bltas te mthong na myig gi dbang po dga' ba'i rgyu// dri nga ma mchis gtsang dang zhi bar gda' bas na// bsnyams te gsung na sA'i/ 
110b2(mdo): dbang po dga' zhing 'dag/ mthul bar myi thogs yon tan gong ma mang po'i rgya// yan lag 'di drin btung na sgo zhing yi ga 'be// 'ayungs mdug dang nyam nga gnod pa'i nad myi 'gyur// rnam pa lu/ 
110b3(mdo): tu lus la bde ba sna tshogs skyed// 'di 'dra'i don thos rna ba'i dbang po dga' zhing 'dug/ dbang po gzhan kun yid kyi dbang du mgu zhing rangs// 'phags pa'i sa rdo rje nags tshal gzhan kun kyang // 
110b4(mdo): kha dog mdangs ldan ro mchog gda' bas rgyas par nus// seMs// can khams rnams gang gis 'thungs te myong 'gyur ba// dang / nga po thams cad snga pas gsal zhing bde bar 'gyur// khyod la
110b5(mdo): 'phags lam yan lag brgyad ldan mngal bas na// yang dag lta bas mtha' gnyis blo bstsal snyoms par gzigs// rtog pa'i gdung brtsal sred pas skom pa tshim zhing ngoms// de bzhin
110b6(mdo): nyid bstan sems la dga' ba'i mchog kyang bskyed// yang dag rtog pas yid kyi las ngan gsum spangs shing // mnyam dang myi mnyam rtogs pa yongs bor phyir myi 'byung // lta ba'i dngos po kun
110b7(mdo): bsrabs sgrib pa byang sla ste// reg na lus kyi skyon byang thams cad mkhyend du mgyogs// yang dag ngag gcig bdag dang gzhan la gnod pa myed// chos gang brjod kyang bkris don nges snyoms dam pa
110b8(mdo): gsung // tshig snyan dang sgra myi rtsub yid 'ong mnyan gyi skyo// bden legs spras mthun ma nor brjod na lce yang 'dag/ yang dag las mtha' nyon mongs zhi ba'i rgyur yang 'jug/ dge mngon mdza
111a1(mdo): kyang srog cing stong par rab tu mkhyen// mnyen des las spyod gnod dpa'ache ba'i rgyur gyi 'dzad// dgel 'jam spyod rgyu reg na dga' zhing yid du 'ong // yang dag 'tsho ba nyon mongs rnam pa kun
111a2(mdo): myi stsogs// 'tsho ba dag par 'dzud cing chos don rdzogs par mdzad// rang bzhin dngabs spyod/ lam tshul 'chos rtog kyi ldang // mthong dga' bltal 'tshal bltas na myig gi dbang po 'dag/ yang
111a3(mdo): dag rtsol ba dge za ba yongs su rgyas bgyi bar// nan tan bsgrubs spros pas thams cad mkhyend pa gsal tu btsud// sdig dring byang rtsol dgu dge ba'i phyogs su 'gyur// tshul khrims spos chor
111a4(mdo): rig pa snga'i dbang po dga'// yang dag dran pa pha rol phyin dad pa drug dang bcu// chad myed bzhi dran nyon mongs bdun la/ sa yongs su 'dal// yun ring dus nas yang dag chub pa
111a5(mdo): bsgoms na// 'gon po khyod kyi dgongs pa nam yang nyams kyi kadal// ci la 'ang thogs myed dpa' bo zil gyis mnon pas// yang dag dran na pal kun 'dun cing dad pas 'du// 
111a6(mdo): yang dag ting 'dzin log pa spangs la snyoms zhugs pas// chos kun na pa da ka thams cad mkhyem du mngon sangs rgyas// yan lag de rgyas nyon mongs thams cad rnam par bstsal// 'khor
111a7(mdo): pa'i gdug spangs khyab cing snyoms pas bde bar mdzang // chos 'di bkad thos ma pa'i dbang po dga' zhing 'dag/ rnam shes kun 'dag pa zhes mchog bzhi thob par 'gyur// phyi rol
111a8(mdo): yul kun sangs rgyas zhing du yongs sbyangs pas// dga' bde mchog gnas dam pa rin ches zhing dang ldan// sems cad snod mya nga byang chub rgya gu ma skye bas// bdag nags po ton rgyas/ 
111b1(mdo): pa grangs myed mngon sangs rgyas// khyod la rnam dag byang chub phyogs kyi chos mnga' ba// 'jig rten khams na rmad rung btsal dka' phal la myed// nyan thos rang rgyal kun kyang cha
111b2(mdo): shes dper gyi bzod// 'jig rten gsum po gzhan ltas smos su ga a rung // bde gshegs sras bcas rgyar gyir byang chub phyogs mapa sa// bzlas shing dad pa phyir skye ba tags ngo mtshar che/ 
111b3(mdo): de 'dra gzhal yas chos kyis grub pa'i yon tan dbyings// bsams shing ngoms dka' legs dgu tshogs la phyag kyang 'tshal// / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi le'u ste bcu pa'o// 
111b4(mdo): ri rab drung gi bar rim gru bzhi tha ma la// lho byang shar nub phyogs su lta ba'i ngos yod la// gzhan la tha dad phyogs kyi mtshan mar snang mod kyi// bdag ni 'di'i phyogs snyam
111b5(mdo): de la sems pa myed// khyod la so so yang dag mkhyen banyi ma pa ba// gzhan la ba dang bye brag rnam par gas la 'byed cing // don chen grangs myed rab dang rkyen bzhin kun
111b6(mdo): thob kyang mkhyen pa'i rang bzhin mtshwany+dzi gcig cing rtog pa myed// de la ba tang sgrub 'du shes sna tshogs myi mnga' yang // dus gsum chos dang don rnams skad cig gcig gis rig/ gsung gcig yan lag
111b7(mdo): grangs myed brda' skad kun tu 'phro// rdul phran gcig brjod spobs pa bskal pa'i mthar myi zad// don dang chos rtogs rang bzhin bstan la 'khrul myi mngal// nges pa'i tshig mkhyen dkang bstan
111b8(mdo): myi gsal thogs pa myed// spobs pa che mnga' ci spor rgya bskyed pas ma 'tshal// dpag yas yang dag rig mngal khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// bang rim gong ma rnam gsum ngos bzhir 'khor ba ni// 
112a1(mdo): phyir sdoms bcu gnyis yod pa kun kyang rir pa 'dzin// klu dang 'gro ba mar gnas gtos dkyil gzhan du dka'// 'on kyang grangs dang rim pa spyi tsam brjod par bya// khyod la tus gsum mnyam
112a2(mdo): 'jug med kyi gzungs mnga' ba// mkhyend pa'i yon tan myi mnyam mthu can bcu gnyis bgrangs// spros te rgyas par brjod na bskal par zad myi shes// don mdzad khyod las mdol tsam de dag myi
112a3(mdo): tu brjod// mngon par dbang bskur gzungs dang ye shes ldan pa dang // nam dag sgra dbyangs myi zad mdzod du grags par bzhi// mtha' yas kun tu 'khyil dang rgya mtsho'i sgra dbyangs dang // ma chags skor 'jug
112a4(mdo): pad mo'i rgyun du gzungs mchog brgyad// so so yang dag mkhyen la 'jug dang sangs rgyas kyar// kha dog mtha' yas sangs rgyas yon tan sgrub pa dang // de rnams bcu gnyis ye shes
112a5(mdo): ri rab rten du gnas// 'gro ba yang po'i gzungs kyis gcol bya ka 'tshal// ri ba lhun po de'i ngos phyir bya ltas pa// ku ne kyang rin chen dbang gi mthu dang rnam par ldan// ngos bzhi gser
112a6(mdo): shel dang bye du rgya yin te// phyogs bzhi dam mkha' bsgyur dkal ri'i mtshon bzhin snang// phyogs 'tshams grwa bzhi zung dod skabs byin dpe legs pa// gling bzhi so sor nyin mtshan chod 'dzin dbang yang
112a7(mdo): sbyar// 'og phyogs brtan zhing spying po mnyen 'jam dgal bde ba// lha sde mang por 'du zhing dges par gnas kyi gzhi// de bzhin khyod kyi dbang bcu mngon mdzad phyir stond pa// kun kyang rin chen dab
112a8(mdo): mchog ka re yang thogs pa myed// dbang gi yon tan mthu yang rnam pa du ma ste// gang la mi rigs de'i tshul tu so song sgyur// 'khrul myed thabs dang ldan pas mdzad dgu dmyigs su phebs// 'gro
112b1(mdo): bdag bdag smon pa yid bzhin rangs pa thob// brtan zhing dga' ba de'i spyod pas kun tu phan 'dogs la// sdug bsngal spong dgu khyod kyi skyabs su 'dod par mos// dbang bcu de dag so so'i yon tan dmyigs brjod na// 
112b2(mdo): tshe la mnga' bas tshad myed skal par byin gyis rlob// sems la mnga' bas brjod 'das ting 'dzin kun la 'jug// yo byad mngal bas grangs myed 'jig rten bkod pa sgrub// las la angal bas tus tshul mthun par
112b3(mdo): nam sbyi ston// skye la mnga' bas 'jig rten kun tu rang dbang 'byung // mos pa yangal bas chos dbyings rgyal bar gzigs// smon lam mngal bas zhing tus kang bzhed mngon 'chab rgya// rdzu 'phrul mngal bas 'dzi/ 
112b4(mdo): rten kun tu rnam par 'phrul// chos la mngal bas chos sgo mtha' dang dbus myed ston// ye shes mnga' bas sangs rgyas chos rnams mngon du gyu rang // dbang pocu'i mchog ldan das phyag kyang 'tshal// 
112b5(mdo): ri po de'i ngos brgya nang du bltas pa yang // rgya ni lha rdzas rin chen zhi las grub pa yid// lhun sdug mkhrang pa'i stobs ning / 'ang+ga ril byed// btan mchog sra ba'i yul la cis kyang
112b6(mdo): g.yos myi srid// khyod la nang nas mkhyen pa'i stobs bcu mnga' ba ni// bla myed dam pa'i ye shes rnam dag bzhi las byung // bsgom pa'i tshogs kyis 'phags te shes pa kun las 'das// blo mchog
112b7(mdo): brtan pa'i stobs la sgrib dgus 'gebs myi nus// nyan thos rang rgyal phal la myed pa'i stobs bcu po// gnas dang gnas myin rig pa'i stobs mchog mnga' bas na// gnas yod 'thad dang gnas
112b8(mdo): myed bskabs myin yan lag mkhyed// nam mkha' mtha' yas gtugs pa kar yang thugs su chung // las kyi rnam sbyin rig pa'i stobs mchog mngal bas na// dus gsum las kyi rgya gnas rnam par sbyin pa mkhyen/ 
113a1(mdo): mos pa sna tshogs rig pa'i stobs mchog mnga' bas na// gcig nas gar mos rab 'bring rnga kun tu mkhyedang // sna tshogs rnam rig pa'i stob mchog mngal bas na// 'du byed rnam gsum 'byung
113a2(mdo): sam gang gis spyod pa mkhyer// dbang po sna tshogs rig pa'i stobs mchog mang labs na// rab 'bring ba ma'i dbang po ga pa las cir 'gyur mkhyen// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam rig stobs mchog mngal bas ma/ 
113a3(mdo): lam gyi rnam pa gang gis cing smra ba cing 'byung mkhyen// ting 'jim sngon 'gro yang rig stobs mchog mngal bas na// kun nas nyon mongs nas dag gang gis 'thob pa mkhyen// sngon gyi gnas dgongs rig
113a4(mdo): stobs mchog mnga' bas ma// bdag dang gzhan gyi sngon che mahA/ gdugs mkhyenang // mngon mdzad 'phrul gyi spyan rig stob/ smras mchog mngal bas na// nam mkha'i mthas gtugs chos rnas
113a5(mdo): thams cad ma lus gzigs// mngon mdzad zag pa zad rig sngon gyi stobs mchog mnga' bas ni// bag chags 'tshams sbyor kun bcom chos sku rab brnyes mkhyen// stobs bcu'i
113a6(mdo): dbyig dang ldan pas gzi ma pa' mthu'i phul// legs kyi spyan sdug brtan pa mchog la phyag kyang 'tshal// ri rab klu bzhi brtse mo shi nad tu mapo gas pa la// gnod sbyin dpa' bo laka na rdo rje'i sde bzhi gnas/ 
113a7(mdo): gtul dka' cis myi thub pa dgra'i sde 'jig mkhas// rdzu 'phrul rang dbang thob cing gzi brjid mchog kyang 'bang // khyod kyi ye shes bzhi po phul byung rtse mo la// myi 'jigs sde bzhi spobs pa'i garma
113a8(mdo): dang ni// bdud dang phas kyi dgra rnams gal pa'i sde 'jig mkhas// kun las rnam par rgyal ba'i yon tan mchog kyang 'bab// zag pa ma lus thams cad zad par thugs chud de// bar chad chos rnams/ 
113b1(mdo): gzhan du myi 'gyur lung ston cing // 'byung ba'i lam rnams phun sum tshogs 'gyur myi bsnyengs pas// mngon par sangs rgyas khyu mchog seng ge'i ngango srog/ dbang po gtul dkar gyi 'dra dngol khyod zhugs pas// 
113b2(mdo): gnod sbyin sde dang rdo rje mtshon kyang dper myi bzod // myi 'jigs bzhis mthus thogs byed bde ba kyes mchog kyang brnyes// de 'dra'i mad chos sde bzhi mngal la phyag kyang 'tshal// 
113b3(mdo): dbang sgyur gyi chos phun sum gyi le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / nam mkha' yal la cis kyang chags shing gos pa myed// rnam pa gang dpa'agrogs kyang myi 'dre dben pa'i tshul// rgya che yangs pa'i
113b4(mdo): mtha' ma thug myed kun tu khyab// dngos po 'byung dgu'i go 'byed yid bzhin mthar sgo phye// khyod kyi chos sku bag chags ma lus kun byang bas// rnam pa thams cad mkhyend kyang gzu ba dang 'dzin gyis
113b5(mdo): dbyed// chos dbyings rnam dag mdzes gzhal mkhyend pas// kun tu khyab// yon tan rdzu 'phrul ko 'byed sems can man+tasgo btod// skyon myed rnam par gsal ba dpag dka' chos kyi sku// 
113b6(mdo): rdul bral nam mkha'i tshul las dper blangs pa stod bsngags kyi pa// gang zag chos la bdag myed yang dag mkhyend kyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blangs myed bzhin khyod la bstod// 'gro 'od skye 'jig
113b7(mdo): mtha' bral chos su dam pa de// nam mkha' rnam pa myed las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // yod myed mtha' yas 'das te brjod du myed pas lhag// 'dra ba'i dper blangs dpe bla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// 
113b8(mdo): ma g.yos tu mar sprul ston chos sku dam pa de// 'gyur myed nam mkha'i tshul las dper blang bstod bsngags kyang // bskyod bsgyur gyi 'tshal sems can don mngal 'thob kyis lhag// 'dra ba'i dper bra
114a1(mdo): dpem byed bzhin khyod la bsod// dpag dag 'a thab yangs gting gcos spad pa pa de// gnas dga' rnas ma kha'i tshul las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // gang gis de rig chos su
114a2(mdo): su mra 'gyu kyis sug/ 'dra ba'i dper thang dpe' ma byed bzhin khyod la bstod// mtha nyid gnyis myed pa'i chos su dab pa de// kyi gnyis nas la ba'i tshul las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang / 
114a3(mdo): kyi gnyis nyid la gnas kyang mangs byed pa nyen gyis skrag/ 'dra ba'i dbang thang dpel sa med pazhin 'odas gtong // mnyam byed mnyam pa'i mnyam nyid chos spangs pa do// nam mkha' snyoms pa ga
114a4(mdo): las dper blang bstod bsngags kyang // tshad myed tshogs gnyis yongs dka bzhin nyid kyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dpeng thang da zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// 
114a5(mdo): chos kyi sku'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / nyi ma'idakyil 'khor mngon snang rgyas pa kun tu 'char// skye dang 'bri myed rang bzhin nyid kyis 'od dang ldan// gza' chena'i sh+lo
114a6(mdo): na snang zhing skar bram mal gyis gnod// nyi gar des bskul nyal dgu ldang zhing don la 'dod// 'od bstan mun dbab snyam gyi bri bkrol gyi 'byung du// ga la mtho mthong sngar 'char me tog kha yang 'byed// 
114a7(mdo): ri dang zhabs kyi dbang gis dma' dmar sngon du nub// dus kyi tshod kyi 'khrul pas yid ches 'thus pa'i gzungs// 'khyims shing tshon stug rim par 'phel ba li// 'khor lo can gyi 'od zerags
114a8(mdo): 'bar mun pa rnam par sel// gnas nas nyi 'khyims 'bas nyes pa'i lhas yin pas// dkon gdung rlan cing bsil snyam kum tu re zhing sdod// phun sum tshogs pa khyod kyi long spyod rdzogs kyi sku// skye dang
114b1(mdo): mya ngan 'da' byed rang bzhin nyid kyis rtag/ nam 'bring khro bo mdzang nyan thos phyogs kyi gnas// ston pa des bskul gti mug 'byung zhing don chen grul// bstan dang gyi bstan bye brag 'byed pa'i rtag rkyen
114b2(mdo): tu// dge rtsa che zhing mtho byang chub sems kyang 'byed// dge ma cung chung sgrub pa'i dbang gis mthong myi nus// smon lam 'bras bu chud myi za bas rton pa'i gzungs// yon tan chad myed sna tshogs
114b3(mdo): 'od ltar skul 'khor// dkyil nas ye shes snang 'bar sgrib pa'i mud kyang sel// gang gis sku'i 'od mthong chos ston ltas yin pas// myi khom sems cad chos khrus ngoms snyam dang cing spros/ 
114b4(mdo): rab yang mya ngan myi 'dal long spyod rdzogs su de// nyi ma skyed da 'bri byed las dper blangs bstod pasngags kyang // 'khod par smon lam mthus bzhugs gzha byar rtag gis lhag/ 
114b5(mdo): 'dra ba'i dper blangs dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// rgya sras kho bo tshogs mang 'khor lding nyer 'chog// nyi ma kan skar 'khor bcas dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // 'phrul
114b6(mdo): chen tshogs kun bsam pa yid bzhin ldan pas lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// 'gon po'i mthus bskul byang chub sa nas sar 'phar ba// nyi shar nyam dku ldang la
114b7(mdo): dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // sa mchog kun tu 'od nyid thob par bskul gyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blangs dpel zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// long spyod rdzogs sku bstan dang tog byed pa// 
114b8(mdo): nyi ma bri bkol myed las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // gnas la mthun zhing mthong khye lhag// 'dra ba'i dper brad dpel zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// dge rtsa ches mthong byang chub mchog/ 
115a1(mdo): ki sems dbye ba'i yo char mye tog 'byed las dpyor grangs bstod bsngags kyang // 'jig rten bla ma'i chos sud ston cing stobs pas lhas// 'dra pa'i dper thang dpe' bla byed bzhin
115a2(mdo): khyod la bstod// dge ma chu ngu'i spyod yul myin te ma mthong ba// dpa' bar sngon du nub las dper blang bstod pasngags kyang / ma mtho bsgribs kyang thos pas don chen thob kyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dpes
115a3(mdo): thang dpe' zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// kha dog sna tshogs 'od bzang sku la mngal ba de// tshon sdug 'khyims pa'i tshul la ste dbye grangs bstod bsngags kyang // 'od kyis reg dgu ti 'a
115a4(mdo): tu ma 'thob kyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe' zla myed pa zhin khyod la bstod// ye shes mchog bzhi 'bar bas sgrib pa'i mun sel// nyi ma mun srel rgyal las dpe
115a5(mdo): blangs bstod bsngags kyang // phyi nang sgrib dgu ye shes 'od kyis sel bas lhag// 'dra ba'i dper blangs dpe zla myedabazhin khyod la bstod// sku las 'od 'byung mthong na chos ston
115a6(mdo): ltas 'dzin cing // chos kyi bdud rtsi khu ba char la dang spo ba// nyi khyims char 'bab ltas las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // 'od 'byung gnas kyi tshul las chos don rig par rung // btung bzhis
115a7(mdo): myi tshugs chos kyi rtsi'i char phab pas// byang chub myag ku bde gshegs sdong por skyed smrab cing // yongs sbyin 'bras bu phan 'dogs 'gron chos lhag/ 'dra bo'i dper blang dpe' zla myed bzhin khyod la bad
115a8(mdo): nyin par nyi ma'i skyil du skar ma gzhan brlag kyang // gza' chen gzi ldan rnams kyis gzhan byed mngon par snang // nyi zla gza' dang banas su gang gis mthong 'gyur ba// de la tshe ring ba de dga' dge' ba'i
115b1(mdo): nga rnan du ga com sa / dzums sa ma @#pa dus/ pa da
115b2(mdo): pa 'di nyid pa kyang bgyid// yong skyod bu'i 'khod nyan thos kyi snang yang // de so gas thob ga'i ldan ma cu gan/ yang bye sa rgya ma sas grus / 'di nyid la dod / 
115b3(mdo): sa pas ma sa da kyang ra sa pa nas kyim pas tum na bzhan
115b4(mdo): rnam par 'dul zhing sdig la pag byed 'jug/ mthu che brtsan drag/ khro bo rnams kyi yon tan de// kun kyang thog ma mgon po dag/ gi mthu las byung // drag da la sna tshogs ci rigs su phebs
115b5(mdo): spyod / khro bo brjid ldan 'khor du mngal la phyas kyang longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skul khro'u bracu gsum pa'o// 
115b6(mdo): zla ba 'od gsal mthur ldan pa si la pa'i rang bzhin can// bdag la 'gyur ba skyed kyang gzhan dbang 'gyur lnga ste// dkar po yang zhing dku po ma zhi po 'chi// mtshan gyi chos dag kya mngon sdang mngon sdang nyi ma 'a'i
115b7(mdo): me song cu ches rkyen bzhin gzugs pa rtan kyi rgyang 'phyag po byang chub sngon spyod tags ni ngos la bkod par snang // mthong su mchod snod ste 'dod stsos la rtse ltung bas// skad byan mang po na ma ma
115b8(mdo): btsun pa'i brjid dang ldan// 'khyims ma mtha' skong dag bakhyon mdzes sde khod de mnyam/ dkyil nas mthu chen yod kyis la mya stor gdung ba sa // / gnos mag 'khyims gnyis 'od 'cha gyi sgra ma yin pas// rma nam
116a1(mdo): drang phyed 'gyur snyas kun kyang de zhing sdod// sprul su mkhyon gsal ma thu chen long nas dge byams pa// sangs spyod kyi 'gya cu las bcu la dbang ston mdzad de// tshogs gnyis bgyings dang kyang na 'dal ba la
116a2(mdo): cig cang stod// rnyog snga mun pab tshe'ang yon tan mad du 'bab// sems can snod kyi rkyen bzhin so sor rang gis mthong // s+pha cika khung nas byang chub spyod tshul grangs myed snang // mthong thos mchod stod myi ngoms dpang po/ 
116a3(mdo): rnam par dag// 'phags pa nyan thos mchog ldan 'khor gyi rmad du bcad// dri myed zla ba'i zhal la rnam dag 'od kyis bskor// dkyil na byams pa chen po par 'dogs 'phags lam brtsod// kang gis 'od gsal
116a4(mdo): 'dom tshad kra shis des mthong ba// nyon mongs sug bsngal rnam par byang ba sam/ le zhing spong // chos la rang dbang dges mdzad pa'i sprul sku re// sdang bsil zla ba'i rdul las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // chad sde
116a5(mdo): byams dang dger ldan ye shes gsal gyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper bla pa dpel zla myed bzhin khyed la bstod// longs spyod rtag pa'i// sku las sna tshogs ca 'byu ga/ zla ba skye 'bri'i dpe blangs bstod
116a6(mdo): 2sa kyang // rnams bsas pas gyid tu chos kyis gyu// / wa ba'idaper thangs dpo na byed pazhes khyong la 'byod// rdzogs shing kya na 'das la stsogs pa'i nas stsal pa// thal gamasas
116a7(mdo): skyed 'bris dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // lha dang phyi 'brel ngan 'gro khams su 'grib pas lhas// 'dra ba'i dper tha ba dpe ba byed bzhin khyod la stod// rtog 'thun dus yod tad ma chog gis smom mdzang pa/ 
116a8(mdo): mtshan gyi zla nya bzang las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // nyon mongs zil mnan nam byang chos su bgyur gyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper thab dpel zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// sems can sdod kyi rkye nang du
116b1(mdo): yid bzhin gzugs 'char ba// mu tha gzugs brnyan sdang las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // kang la cis 'dul gzugs kyang chos kyi ston pas lhag// 'dra ba'i dper bra da lel ma byed bzhin khyod la bstod// rtog/ 
116b2(mdo): su dus yod tan la chog gis sgrol ma da pa// mchan gyi tha nya batha las dpeng blangs pastod bsngags kyang / nyon mongs pal mnan napa byab chos su bsgyud kyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper thab dpel zla byed bzhin khyod
116b3(mdo): la bstod// sems cad sdod kyi kye nad tu yid bzhin gzugs 'chang ba// chu zla gzugs brnyam sna bas dper grangs bstod pa sngags kyang // grang sa tsas 'dul gzugs kyang chos kyi sto dad pas lhas// 'dra ba'i dan
116b4(mdo): thangs dpe' zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// bsku gcig las bya / chub spyod pa rnam bstod pa// ri bong gzugs d+ha ma sdang las de/ dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // dka' thub de 'dra 'gra
116b5(mdo): las 'das kyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blangs dpel 'dra zla myed bzhi na khyod la bstod// mthong thos mchod cing bstod la dbang po yongs dag pa// mchod bstod myig la phan las dper blangs bstod bsngakra
116b6(mdo): kyang // skal yod dad pa skye zhing myig lnga 'thob kyis lhag// 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// 'phags pa nyan thos 'khor bgyid chad du btsun brjid pa// zla ba skar phran bcas las dper blangs
116b7(mdo): bstod bsngags kyang // 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das kyi yon ta brjid kyis lhas/ 'dra ba'i dpe thang dpe sa myed pa ni mchod la 'asngos// dri phyed zhal bas pa yon tan 'od kyis nam thong la// tha la khyims mdzes
116b8(mdo): par 'khor las dper blangs bstod bsngags kyang // 'od bcas zhal mthong ye shes snang ba 'thob kyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang dpe la zla myed bzhin khyod la bstod// byams kyis nyon mongs sel cing mkhyen/ 
117a1(mdo): kyis lam ston dag// ba'i gdubams las snang dpeng thang bstod pasngags kyang // drug pa snga la gdu nga ses 'phags lam rnam pa pon gyis sug/ 'dra ba yi dper thab dpel ma myed bzhin khyod la bstod/ 
117a2(mdo): gar gyis kra shis 'od mthong bag chags yongs 'byang ba// zla 'khyibs nyi khri'i ltas 'dzind dper blar bstod bsngags kyang // bag chags yongs sel steng tu tshogs chen 'gyengs kyis lhag/ 'dra ba'i dper blang
117a3(mdo): dpe' zla sbed panyid khyod la bzod// 'gro ba'i dod mngad pu sum de 'dra'i sku yang labs// rgyal zas gzhan gyi yon tan su gsum der 'dus shing // bdeng gshegs pa lus kun dang hrul 'dra spyod pa nyam pa
117a4(mdo): rgyal sras rgyal ba'i mthul gus par phyag kyang 'chal// rmya skang sa po 'tshogs ni phyogs bzhi'i so mar dbapa// rtag par las nyes dri myed bla ba'i 'khor nas rgya// legs nyes dus kyi chod ldam sa
117a5(mdo): tshogs kun la bston// shar nub gung skur dam yang byed par 'an ra// 'phags pa nyan thos dge sbyong 'bras bu bzhir gnas pa/ 'khor bar bsdoms pas bsdams bzhin 'phrul sku
117a6(mdo): 'khor na gnas// dge sdig po dmyigs rgya rkyen 'bras bu chos pazhen ston// yul dang dus tshul bskald pa'i rkyen bzhin mthun pa spyod// yon tan du mas 'phags pa nyan thos chen po rnams// 
117a7(mdo): tshul khrims ting lang nad shes rab rnam mo yad ston ma pa' ste// khyod kyi 'khor kyang 'jig rten mos kyi mthung ldan pa// gtso bo'i dam pa zham 'bring bcas la phyag kyang 'tshal// sprul dpa'i sku'i le'u ste/ 
117a8(mdo): bcu bzhi pa'o// / ga thal lag dngos po'i rgya ni skab ma yin pa nye// nyin mtshan nyi zla'i 'khor na gyi sngang gu myi gcod// brgyal brgya la ma snang nasha / 
117b1(mdo): nub mtha' du 'byung // skar ma rang gyi mtshan nyid gzhal phyir yod myi gtong // rang rgyal nyid kyang byang chub seMs las byung ba ste// bde gshegs 'khor dang rdo rje'i padam la bzhugs myi dmyigs// gal te
117b2(mdo): 'jig rten 'byung che dkon pa dben gnas kyang // byang chub sems kyi mthang du tha myed mchog nyid thob// bse ru 'khor bcas 'gar zhing shi nad tu dben mos pa// byis pa bkri phyir shing rtarnam gsum
117b3(mdo): sbyar dang 'dra// gzal lag tshul dang spyan snyam bde gshegs 'grub kyis lhag/ thabs mkhas kun la 'dren pa dpe' myed khyod la bstod// rang byang chub kyi le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// 
117b4(mdo): 'dod pa khams kyi mtho ris rim pa dru ga gi lha// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chags shing bde spyod/ pas// srid rgyu kun tu sbyor pa'i sred pa phyi zad des// 
117b5(mdo): 'khor bar 'khor ba'i chos kyi rgyun ni gzhar gyi gcod/ khyod kyi thugs rje chen pos 'dod pa'i khams bzung ba// stug bsngal lci bas rnam par rtse la lhag par bskyabs// sbom la/ 
117b6(mdo): stobs kyis srid pa ched du ma btang ste// ji srid 'khor ba yod par btang snyoms blo myi dgongs// 'jig rten mtha' yas khams su lha rdzas bde bas rol// skye ba bzhin bzung ris su ched du 'byung ba bstan/ 
117b7(mdo): sems can ma lus don tu dka' ba sna tshogs mdzad// 'gro ba thams cad skyob pa'i gtso la phyag kyang 'tshal// thugs rje chen po'i lelu ste bcu drug pa'o// 
117b8(mdo): gzugs yod khams kyi/ pa po ris rim pa bcwo brgyad lnga// bsam gtan rtse gcig gnas pa'i dga' dang yid du ldan// 'dod chags myi dge'i chos ni rnam par sa ba cing spangs// thun mong ngam yin ting
118a1(mdo): 'dzin mas kyis lhag para' tsho// khyod la ma 'dres bco brgyad bde gshegs chos mapa ga/ rtag tu rtse gcig mnyam par bzhag pa'i dbyings dang ldan// ye shes sdang la sgrim pa'i rnas pa
118a2(mdo): kun kyang sangs// tshangs pa ltar bcas nyan thos rang rgyal kun pas lhag/ 'khrul pa phyi mang la sku gsung thugs la spyon ma chags// tsaco myi mngal su 'dug bdud kyis klags kyi zeng // dgongs pa mnyam ma
118a3(mdo): la rmongs pa'i shas ma mchis// rtag tu mnyam bzhag spyod lam bzhi la 'khrul gyi mngal// 'du shes sna tshogs kyi mngal kun la mnyam nyid snyoms// ma brtags btang snyoms myi mngal tshangs pa'i 'khor lo bskor/ 
118a4(mdo): mos pa nyam pa myi mngal dge chos rgyun myi 'chad// brtsona'agrus nya sa pa 'dul ba'i tshul bzhin sgrub// dgongs pa nyams pa gyi mnga' dus gsum kun tu 'jug// ting 'dzin
118a5(mdo): nyams pa myi ma la yang dag mnga' dang mnyam// shes rab nyam sa pa myi mang gzhan gyi dring kyi 'dzag// rnam grol nyams pargya mang gnyis 'dzind chags dang thal// sku'i 'phrin las ye shes
118a6(mdo): sngon 'gro rjes 'jug pas// rnam pa kun tu sems can grangs myed ma lus 'dul// gsub kyi 'phrim las ye shes sngon 'gro rjes 'jug pas// lung bstan chos bshad thams cad don yod don chen thob// thugs kyi 'phrin las/ 
118a7(mdo): ye shes sngon 'gro'o rjes rnga 'jug pas// sems dang yid dang rnam shes mtshan du brjod las grol// 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs lakhye nad 'jug pas// sngon chem byang ci 'gags bgrang ba'i tshul gyi/ 
118a8(mdo): mkhyend// ma 'ongs dus la cha kas ma thogs mkhye nang 'dug pas// 'byung 'gyur 'jig 'gyur ma lus mngon gsum nyid kyis 'am khye dang // da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags pa sogs mkhyen 'jug pas/ 
118b1(mdo): chos rnams skad cig rtul phran yan chad ji bzhin mkhyend// ma 'dres bcwo brgyad par la yang sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// rtag tu mnyam par bzhag kyang sems can don mang mdzad// rtog pa thams cad spangs kyang mkhyen
118b2(mdo): rnam par rol// bsam gyis myi khyab chos mnga' khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i le'u bcu bdun pa'o// / gzugs byed rnal 'byor de bzhi la gnas pa lha'i rnams// gzug
118b3(mdo): kyi rnam bral dad kyis gtse ba kun byed de// kha tog dbyibs kyis bgrang ba de dag myi dmyigs kyang // skye ba'i sa ru dbye ba sems kyi rim pa yod// khyod la myi gnas mya ngan 'das pa'i mchog mngal ba// gang zag chos
118b4(mdo): su 'jod pa'i gzugs rnams yongs spangs te// spyod lam kun la spyod kyang ni nad tu mnyam bzhag pa// byang chub mthal yas nam mkham mtha' yas tshul dang 'dra// chos kyi dngos po rtul tsam dmyigs
118b5(mdo): byed pa// gzung du mi'ang myed pa cung zad byed dang 'dra// gzung dang 'dzind pa sems tsam nyid du thugs chung ba// sems la/ gang yang myed pa rnam shes mtha' yas 'dra// rtog pa kun gyis dge
118b6(mdo): ye shes rnam pa myed// mthal las grol bas 'du shes yod myed spangs dpa'adra// me dmar shi bzhin chad ltas mya ngan 'da' myi 'gyur// bde rtag ngag rtsang rnam dag nyid la phyag kyang 'tshal// / skye mched mtha' yas
118b7(mdo): kyi le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // / khyod la 'das pa'i dus kyi yon tan tshul bstod pas// byang chub sems dpa' kun la bstod pa nyid du 'gyur // da lta ba ma 'ongs dus kyi yon tan tshul bstod la
118b8(mdo): dus gsum bde bar gshegs pa kun la bstod par 'gyur// de'i chos rnams so sor phye zhing bstod pas ma// yan lag bcu gnyis can gyi gsupa rab kun bstod kya ngang // zha 'bring 'khor du rtogs pa'i yon tan bstod pas ma/ 
119a1(mdo): 'kho bo nyan thos dge 'dun kum kyang bstod par gyu dang // na na skyes bu seng ge khyong dang bcas la bstod pa yis// dkon mchog gsum po kun kyang zhapa la bstod kyangs pa// yon tam thong/ 
119a2(mdo): cig mngalan kun tu ka la khyab// rgya che chached kyi tshogs dang ldan la phyag kyang 'tshal// 'jig rten tshad pa'i tshul las 'das la phyag kyang 'tshal// khyod dang ga pa 'dras mkhyend pa'i gting la phyag kyang 'tshal// yon tan
119a3(mdo): sna tshogs yang mchog mngal la phyag kyang 'tshal// kun kyi de sdod dbugs 'byid 'gon la phyag kyang 'tshal// 'jig rten khams su rgyal sras mthu chen 'byung ba'i tshe// gso sbyin yan lag brgyad ldan dag pa'i
119a4(mdo): phyogs chos nas// byang chub phyogs dpal ro lang byind pa khams ca dang // ma 'dres chos brgyad bder gshegs chos kyi ba bcu srid/ dazlab ze rgyal rigs che zhing mtho pa'i rigs lngas nas// srid pa'i rtse
119a5(mdo): sor skyes pa'i lha rnam pa yod par 'gyur// nyan thos rang rgyal bya / chub sa bcu'i rim pa nas// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yang 'byung zhes gsungs// de bzhin khyod la sems shing bstod
119a6(mdo): pa su su yob// 'jig rten 'das dpa 'jig rten chos brjod srid par 'gyupa// de 'dra ba'i chos nyid mngal ba'i yon tam rgyas grag las// de ltar 'di dang mthun pa'i tshul gyis brjod cing bstod// de 'dra mad du byar
119a7(mdo): pa'i sems 'phags pa la/ da kyi 'jig rten rim pa'i yon tan thams cad dang // khams gsum bu gro ma'i sems marjod nam pa dkyil bkod kyang // yon tan tshogs kyi rtogs las mas thams nus/ 
119a8(mdo): yon tan mngal ba brjod rung rgyas lta gyi bzub ste/ bdal skad byid du bya ba'i tshig gis 'arjod myi lang // legs kyi rnam pa dpes bstan 'os kyis kyi bzung ste// baspyan bzod 'dra dper lo ma 'jig rten khams ma
119b1(mdo): byed// grangs su byad bkrab pa'i rgyas la gyi bzung ste// de snyed ma pakra prArnam pa cis kyi grangs la myed// 'dzod yas dpag 'das pagrang du myed pa'i yon tan la// bstod pas kyi mchis yon tan bstod bzhin phyag
119b2(mdo): 'tshal bstod// dkon mchog thams cad la stod pa'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// / brjod 'das bsam gyis kyi khyab / khams gsum snying po la// dad pa'i sems kyis yom
119b3(mdo): tan bstod pa'i tshig brjod kyang // 'brel pa myed pa'i cal col tha snyad tsam du dper sbyar ba// rin chungs 'phang dmas skyon du gyur snyam the tsom 'tshal// dper na dge 'dzangs skyes bu phyug dang ldan pa yi// 
119b4(mdo): byol song rigs dma' yan chad kun la khong nas byams// / dadag yung mtshungs par bsdus te ci 'os gson par gsos// rang gi chos bzhin so so'i dkal dang bde la bkod// nyon
119b5(mdo): mongs blos 'phongs spro ba byed bzhin chod byed cig// skyes bu de dad bsams rgyu nang du bya zhes te// 'jim pa'i mis yu rtsa dang ses de gtor cing byin// rgyaran tam spyon gyi rnam la ma // nges
119b6(mdo): bdag kyis khyod la bstod pa de 'dra snya mo// the tsom rnam par 'tshald cing ba spu g.yos par gyur // nongs kyis gnod bkur sdig bshags pabod pa gsol byas ma// yum du sdug bsngal rnam par sbyin par mamyo nga
119b7(mdo): cig/ bzod pa gsol ba'i le'u ste nyi'u pa'o// / dkon mchog gsum la dmyigs pa'i dad pa'i bsam pa dang // 'phags pa myi 'phan yon tan rgya mtsho brjod pa las/ 
119b8(mdo): rdul tsam 'ga' zhig dge ba'i phyogs su 'gyur ba ma// de'i bsod nams 'gro ba kun la bsngo zhing bdapa// byang chub rlabs chen sems bskyed de la brjod bstod pas// mtha' yas sems can ma lus mthun par
120a1(mdo): dad byas te// byang chub ma chog tu sems bskyed yon tan dge san pas// chu rtsig klu chen dbes 'das kun gyis yob ma nog// dang yon sa nas chos sbyin sar thugs legs mastong pas// sems can
120a2(mdo): thams cad pa rol phyi rang bcu rdzogs cadan de// rgyal ba sras kyis la rim par spyod gnas zhig/ rlung nas nags tshal dpa' 'das kun gyis la pa yar shog/ yodan tan sprul pa'i me tog mdzes ldam sa rtse'u mang dag / 
120a3(mdo): khyod yin mtshar mar dbu dang phyag na bsdams pa rnams// tha mal ma lags 'phags pa'i chos la brjod pa stod pas// 'gro ba ma lus chos kyi gter kyis brgyan par shog// skyes mchog mtshan dang dpel byed bzang
120a4(mdo): bo legs brjod de// 'jig rten chos las 'das pa'i tshul gyis bste/ da pas na// sems can ma lus bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzog sa te// skye mched mtshan dang dpel byed bzang po rdzogs par shog/ 
120a5(mdo): min ched bdun dang nye ba'i rin cen rgyal thos te// rgyal sras kyi 'khor lo rgyas po'i legs brjod pas// sems can lus longs spyod pa de rgya phun ldan zhing // chos kyi 'amams rgyan
120a6(mdo): po thob pa shog/ tshogs gnyis athu yis chos la sgyu mas rol bstod pas// sems can ma yus ye shes smos pa'i mchog thob pa ste// skom pa sna tshogs stond pa'i gsupa rabargyar ldan zhing // 'ja sprin 'brug las
120a7(mdo): 'das pa'i yon tan thob par shog// byang chub phyogs chos dran pa nyid bzhag bzhi pa nas// 'phags lam brgyad kyi rab tu brjod de bstod pas ma// sems can ma lus byang chub phyogs kyi chos rdzogs te// ri bdun
120a8(mdo): chu'i dpe' 'das chos rnams thob par shog// so so yang dag rig pa mnga' brjod bsod pas na// sems can ma lus so so yang dag rig sngar zhi // 'gro ba thams cad 'dren pa'i dpung kanyen skyabs kya ru te/ 
120b1(mdo): ring ba zang rim dpel las 'das don thob par shog/ gzungs mchog bcu gnyis ma par ba brjod de bstod pas na// sems cad ma lus gzungs mchog grangs byed kun rdzogs shing // mtha' yas chos rnams rnam
120b2(mdo): bkun tu byang chub ste// ri rab pang rim dpe' las 'das don thob par shog/ mthu che dab pa bcu'i chos rnams brjod de bstod pasam// sems cas ma lus dbang sgyu chos rnams ku rdzogs shing // mangs myed chos
120b3(mdo): yid bzhin 'dod dgur dbang sgyur te// ri rab ngos bcu pa la sa myed pa brjod de bstod pas na// sems can ma lus thams cad stobs bcu kun rdzogs shing // bdud dang dpung byanas chos
120b4(mdo): bas myi thub chos ldan te// ri rab ngos bcu'i dpel las 'das doran thob par shog/ myi 'jigs sde bzhis pa' ba brjod de bsto/ da pas ma// sems cam ma lus thams cad myi 'jigs bzhi yan/ 
120b5(mdo): te// log pas brtsad par dgol ba'i tshig sA myi grag ste// ri rab bzhi dpel las 'das don thob par shog/ bder gshegs smra gsus mnga' ba'i tshul brjod bstod pas na// sems can ma lus rgyal ba'i/ 
120b6(mdo): sku gsum yongs chos shing // myi mnyam mnyam pa'i sku mchog bla na myed grub ste// nyi zla nam mkha' dpe las 'das don thob par shog/ sku dang gsung kyi 'od mchog tshul mchog brjod bstod pas na// sems can
120b7(mdo): lus 'od zer grangs myed tshogs ldan zhing // sna tshogs 'od kyis 'jig rten mtha' yas kun mkhyend te// nyi zla 'khyims pa'i dpel las 'das don thob par shog// 'khro bo rang 'khros rgyud nyan thos tshul bstod brjod/ 
120b8(mdo): pas na// sems can ma lus mnga' chen mthu ldan yongs rdzogs shing // myi ldog byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dang ldan gyurd te// kazal dang rgya skar dpel las 'das don thob pa shog/ thugs rje chen pos seMs
121a1(mdo): can khams bzung brjod bstod pas na// sems can ma lus thams cad thugs rje che rdzogs shing // 'gro ba kun gyi dpung gnyen skyabs dang 'gon kya rad te// 'dod khams mtho ris dpe' las/ 
121a2(mdo): 'das don thob par nog/ mo 'dres bco brgyad mnga' ba'i tshul brjod bstod pas ma// sems can ma lus sangs rgyas ma 'dres chos rdzogs shing // lha myi 'phags pa'i tshogs kyis yongs su mchod bkur te/ 
121a3(mdo): gzugs yod mtho ris dpel las 'das don thob par shog/ mye gnas kyi ngan 'das pa'i tshul brjod pastod pas na// sems can ma lus 'gro ba kun gzigs sang rgyad cing // dus kasum pader gshes
121a4(mdo): ye shes mchog la gnas gyur te// gzugs myed rnal 'byor da dbye la las 'das don thob par shog// / bsod nams bsngo ba'i le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// 
121a5(mdo): 'phags pa byams pa la bstod pa rdzogs s+ho// / khams gsum gyis bstod pa zhes bya ba// 'phags pa myi 'phamargyal tsa ba khyod/ 
121a6(mdo): shag kya seng ges lung bstan pa// nam zhig mngon par sangs rgyas che// mying ni byams pa brjod ces gsung // de nas byams par grags pa la 'azhal dang nongs par 'dzind pa 'byung // de'i the tsomo 'dis bsal
121a7(mdo): zhing // chos rje'i yon tan macas spos// 'gal ba'i skyon du bgyi ba de// spyan du rung ba sgyid lags kyang // skyid par bgyi ba'i dus zhes pas// mtshan dang sa gnyis srel gzhi 'dra// thabs mkhas/ 
121a8(mdo): mer po'i rgya gtang ste// 'dul ba'i sgo mang bston pas na// mngon sangs rgyas nas ring lon kyang // dbyang rgyas sras tshul yadzi nagrang // khyod ni las kyi rmer mkhyen la// thams cad rnal ba'am khyen 'dzad// 
121b1(mdo): rang bzod ma byas gtan tshigs su// chos kyi phun ta ri ka bzhugs// shaka kya sangs rgyas ring ma lon// byang chub sa rum 'thon pa gzigs// de kun nga'i 'khor zhes gsupa// de la phal ma the tsom skyed// nga ni bskal dpa
121b2(mdo): grangs myed kyi// myi mdzes 'di ru sangs rgyas pa 'i// slob ma sbyin byas rtags bstand te// de dag 'dul dbang thabs shes gsung // sngon gyi tshul yang skyang bsams na// bde gshegs kun kyang tshogs mnyam pas/ 
121b3(mdo): byams par brjod pa sangs rgyas rtags// the tsom de bsal khyod la 'os// sku dang longs spyod dpe' byed pa// bdag 'dra ba'i spyod yul myi 'gyur te// gzugs bris mthong las 'os dpags nas// ma pa
121b4(mdo): dgu'i lha rdzas lags su gzub// ka dan gyi pad ma rin chen grapa// chu ba me tog 'cheng zhing legs// snying po yangs la ze/ pa bza // nyin mtshan 'bye 'arnams nus dang mthum// bzang stug
121b5(mdo): kun las 'phags// pad mar nges sam gzhan zhig snyam// the tsom rtog 'dod gzhi ru che// mngal brnyes 'gro ba phan pas rol/ yon tan pad ma 'drar spru lad tam// thog drung dpel legs bzang
121b6(mdo): sdug pa// khyod kyi rin chen chos su 'os// rgyal yangs rgya chen spyod kyi tshul// ze bzangs nyams myed 'khor gyi dpel// 'bye 'dzums dus bzhin 'das myi chags// dus gzhes 'jig rten gyi chags tshul// laSh+Ta
121b7(mdo): los sgyur ba'i rgyal po ni// sngon shed dge bcu rdzogs kyi don// rin chen bdun la dbang bar gyur// nye ba'i rin chen rkyen du grub// gser gyi 'khor lo dbang byed dang // glang po cang shes thal kar gnyis// rta mchog
121b8(mdo): rin chen mgyogs pa dang // bud myed rin ces yid 'ong bzhi// nor bu rin chen 'od dang sngam// khyim bdag rin chem dgos 'byor drug/ blom po rin chen yid bzhin bdun// de dag longs spyod rkye nad du grub// nye ba'i
122a1(mdo): rin chen ral gyi dang // cis myi shigs pa'i pags pa dang // dam pa'i lam mchog dkon pa dang // 'dod pa lnga ldan nags tshal bzhi// khyim rab bsam dkur ldan pa dang // gos mchog rang 'khrung
122a2(mdo): yang dag drug/ lham mchog dpag tshad brgyad 'gros btum// de 'dra'i rdzas 'chang btsun pa grags// khyod ni chos kyi 'khor lo je// bdud 'dul rgya rtsog/ 'khor lo chos kyi 'khor lo mngal// dam
122a3(mdo): mthar snyoms dbang yang sbya // rin chen srapa por theg pa gcig/ de la rigs bzhi brtan par gzhog// po long rig papa rim chen te// 'gro ba skal ldan thogs myed skyel// rin chen btsun mo dpal yang
122a4(mdo): ste// sems can kun la bde ba stobs// rin chen nor bu 'od med/ la ste// des reg sems kyi sdang ba thob// chos sbyin rin chen khyim bdag ste// bder gshegs sa bon rter yang gzigs// 
122a5(mdo): byin brlabs rin chen blon khyor mngal// mi bzhed de bzhin mnyes 'bul// rin chen ral gyi shes rab mang la// spyod dgu gnas su rang dbang 'grol// kri sA kar rgya rin chen pakas// dge blangs sbyin
122a6(mdo): por skad kyi tshul// rin chen mal du bsam gtan btsas+ya// gra yed dang 'khrug myed bde zhing 'jam// mthar da kyis dgu spyod tshal nu mngal// dgal bsil grib ma dben dang ldas// rin chen khyim du sdug por
122a7(mdo): bkod// nam thang gsum kyi sgo dang ldan// rin che dgos su gtsang gnas tshul// khrel snyam chos kyis rnam par bkye bas rin chem snyam tu mkhyen na paldan// gang 'gro mo bzhed thogs pa myed / do ma
122a8(mdo): 'arim chen rnam grangs pa// gab gyi rdzas kya dper myi bzod// ril pa kha dog/ 'dam 'dra bsdams// byang chub mchog snod khyod la mngal// bcud ni bdud rtsi phamam pa byed// nges par ril pa bcun chu
122b1(mdo): cin// gzugs kyi mchog nings pas snang// byams pa chen po bdud rtsa bzhis// chos kyi muni khams gsus pasas// klung shing bsdams pa snyan gyi chog/ gang skyes nas grang nas dang/ 
122b2(mdo): spyod// nges par zhi rkyen yon tan tshogs// sdug bsngas nad la sngan du gyungs// dpal nas rin cen mdzes pa'i// mchod rten dbul bsdams pa'i// mchod rten nges sbyin chos kyi
122b3(mdo): babyings// chos nyid 'asum sbyin bu la bsdams// dge kho brgya ni mang du gyur// theg pa gsum kyi khri 'phang bcas// rnam yang brgyad kyi yang ma bzlas// chos sde bcu gnyis
122b4(mdo): pang bcas// chos dbyings spros myed thum par sdang / byin brlabs dam pa pu shur btags// smon lam chen po sa ka shing btsugs// snying rje chen po gdugs su 'gyebs da / 
122b5(mdo): zag myed chos kyi char kab ldong // dus gsum pader gshegs sku gdung tshul// 'phags pa'i rmad chos kun rdzogs pa// 'gon po khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal/ 
122b6(mdo): sa dang pha rol phyind pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// khyod kyi che ba dpes brjod na// 'jig rten khams nang ma mchis kyang // 'byung ba chen po char brjod pas// rim pa'i tshul las 'ol phyir sbyar/ 
122b7(mdo): rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzugs myed kyis// snod kyi 'jig rten kun bteg lta // khyod kyi yi ma mthal myed rlung // rmen pa byal po 'ang ma lus 'dzin// de'i steng bad gser nas pa// g.yal myed dpal
122b8(mdo): ldan mnyen gling snang// khyod kyi stobs myed stobs kyi tshul// sgrib pa spangs pa rgyal ba'i gcung // de la rgyag nas kyi yang myed// mngon par byed byed dang sgrar snang // khyod kyi smon lam par dgu skyed// las su na
123a1(mdo): byas don du 'grub// de las gting 'byung gnas te// rtsa ba bzang chu sbyin rgyas ltar// khyod kyi thabs la dge dgu rten// bsod nams grangs myed yid bzhin 'phrul// sngags ri khor yug 'phan
123a2(mdo): myed pa// chu chen klong zhing dang byed ltar// dmyig spar khyod kyi shes rab pi zhi gnas 'dzind cing rnam par dag/ rgya mtsho chen po'i lhun gyis grub// rin chen sna tshogs 'byung gnas sbyar// khyod kyis bas
123a3(mdo): gtan rgya mtsho las// chos mchog rin chen kun kyang 'byub// gleng gzhi phyogs cin myi gnas kyi// shar nub lho byang gnas 'cha ltang // khyod kyi brtson 'grus nye che phyir// 'bur ba'i shugs la bsdus kyi
123a4(mdo): 'dus// gzhongs 'di brdzis te smad pa dang // brkos shing gno da byas khyod myed ltar// khyod kyi bzod pa yangs che ba// bzod du ma khas bde la 'go dgangs ri dkar gtsang lha gnyan
123a5(mdo): gnas// mtho bsil gsal skyabs tshol pa ltar// khyod kyi tshul khrims rnam dag mchog// sems can 'tshe ba kun kyi skye ba sa// nags tshal sna tshogs yan lag ldan// sbyin bgyid myi 'byed
123a6(mdo): ste bstang // nas dag yad bzhin sbyin gtong ba// 'anan po khyod la phyag kyang 'tshal// / char bab / nyi ma gang gyur dam// gnas la 'dza dpag lal yang snang // tshong bzang mug snyam
123a7(mdo): rtog pa 'ang s+ye// yams ka'i ltas snyam 'jigs pa'ang 'byung // sprul pa'i sku'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / zla ba 'od gsal rang bzhin bsil// bdag la 'gyur myed gzhan dbang 'gyu
123a8(mdo): yar la kar 'phel mar nag 'bri// snang nga mtshan yang nyi ma bzhin// gzugs rnyan snod rkyen che chun 'byung // byang chub spyod pa ngos la snang // nam na zla 'khyims gnyi dro ltas// skad phran 'khor kyi brjod
123b1(mdo): dang ldan// de bzhin sprul sku byams chen ldan// rtag kyang 'dul dbang skye 'jig stond// 'byung dgur kar 'phel gnag kyang 'bri// rnyog lnga'i mun khrod yon tan 'bar// sems can snod rkyen so sor mthong // byad
123b2(mdo): chub spyod tshul grangs myed ston // 'od mchog bag chag 'byar gyi ltas// mchod pas 'khor gyi btsun du btsun / kang tshe 'jig rten kun grags par// mngon par sangs rgyas tshul stond cing // tshogs 'chang sos
123b3(mdo): can sbyin padzad de// snod du gyu dad pas sku mthong ba// sha du rtul gyi dbyibs lam yang // pha ma'i rgya las grub pa byin// thabs mkhas yab dang shes rab yum// chos la sku mub rang bzhin gcang// sngon chems
123b4(mdo): ba dpag 'das su// dge ba mang po rgyan spyad de// 'gro la phan phyir zhugs pas na// 'bras bu sbyin pa kun tu snang // legs pa ti me'i rgyu chub pa// mtshan bzang sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang // dpel byad
123b5(mdo): bzang po so sor grub// lha myi dag kyang dper myi bzod// rgyu ka ra phyogs bzhi so so dbang // rtag par lam des rnam par 'gro// bzang ngan dus chod kun la stonang // nyin mchad mtshungs par
123b6(mdo): sdod byed 'gro// de bzhin 'phags pa nyan thos rnams// god myed khrims ldan zhamar nge mdzad// dge sdig rgya rkyend chos bzhin ston // skal pa'i rkye nang bzhin 'thun par spyod// yon tan ches 'pha
123b7(mdo): nyan thos rnams// tshul khrims ting 'dzind shes rab ldan// srid par spyod pa yongs bcad cing // lci bas gzi re ba'i khung kun po pa// / song spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// 
123b8(mdo): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang 'char pa// skye dang 'bri myed rang bzhin gsal// skar phran kun brlag gza' chen sna // nyi shar des bskar nyal dkur lnga pa// ga la bzo' dgurar sngar yang 'chang // ga la dmal dkur sngar
124a1(mdo): sa // chum mo kyi la thul ma nus pa'i gsungs// gnasan nyis khrims sa 'bab smras// de bzhin khyod kyisangs kyang su// byed mya nga na kyi nga/ gnas 'jamapa dang na chem// zhar
124a2(mdo): bskus sa sa pa'aphab// dge ma 'i ches mthong bar 'gyur// dge mtshu chung mthong gyi 'gyub// 'bras bu gang 'dod sto gyi dgas// tshogs kun bsam pa med bzhin las// 'dod chags su ma thong chom mtho ba ltas// 'od byung / 
124a3(mdo): gnas las chos don rig/ chos kyi bdud rtsi cham du 'bebs// byang chub myu ku sdong po skyed// nyi zla gzar bcas sus mthong ba// de che re ring ltas su bya// ka za' rnams 'gyed 'dums byed pa yang // sang+ya gang lam bzhin
124a4(mdo): nges pa byed// mgyogs phul skar mkhan gyis kyis shes// rang gi chos las tshul myi 'gal// phan gnod ltas las bag kyang byed/ de yang 'gro la da bston // de bzhin lakhro bo rdo rje la gdung / 
124a5(mdo): 'dul ba'i bsdam las 'da' mod kyang // sdig pa'i 'tshams su/ de myi 'dal// dge sdig mngon ston nga rgyal 'dul// chos kyi skye'o le'u ste bzhi pa'o// 
124a6(mdo): de la dad pas gang sgrub pa// tshe 'di nyid la rang dbang po 'o// drag rdal sna tshogs rigs par spyod// de yang 'gro la phan pa 'i don// gzal lag 'char nub kar rgyu ba// nyi zla'i 'khor du mngon myi sdang / 
124a7(mdo): brgya lam snang na mtha' du 'byu ba// rang gi mtshan nyid gzhan gyi gtong // de bzhin dang rgyal ba se ru ba// rdo rje'i bdan/ a bzhugs kyi rigs// gal te dgon pa dben gnas kyang // mtha' lta bud myed marko
124a8(mdo): nyid thob// mthal la gos shing chags myed pa pa// dngos po 'byung dgu ko yang 'byed// chos sku rnam par rtog spangs pa// yon tam thu 'phrul gos pa 'byed// de bzhin rtag cad bral gyi sku// dpag dka' gting ba
124b1(mdo): sngon 'gro ba// dus gsum dus la chags sogs myed// gzugs myed rnal 'byor gzhar gnas pa// gzugs la brtse bu byed de// kha dog dbyibs su ma dmyigs kyang // sems kyi rim pas sa dbyer yod// de bzhin
124b2(mdo): myi gnas mya ngan 'das// gang zag chos su brjod spangs shing // spyod lam spyod kyang mnyam par gzhog/ me mar shi ltar 'da' ba byed// rgyal sras 'jig rten byung ba'i che// gso sbyong yan lag brgyad ldan na// 
124b3(mdo): ma 'dres bco brgyad chos rnams dang // gtsug lag rgya ma kun kyang srid// rgyal rigs zas ze rus bcus dang // sred pa'i rtse mo lha nams gnas// nyan thos rnams dang nga rgyal rab// byang chub par cu 'byung bar grapa/ 
124b4(mdo): 'dra ba'i rtse bas 'phags pa la// srid kyi 'jig rten rim pa dang / !nas gsum spyod pa dpeng bkod kyang// yon tan ma las khyod ma nus// 'jos tu rung rgyas lta bu bzung ste// bdang skad cig shos brjod kyi sa pa/ 
124b5(mdo): dpe' bstan pas kyis kyi bzung ste// bskrun pabod dper yang 'ja ba byed// rgya che med tshogs ldan la phyag kyang 'tshal// khyod la dus mkhyen kyi gting la phyag kyang 'jas// yod tad ma sum sa
124b6(mdo): la phyag kyang 'jal// kun gyi ro snod 'gon pas phyag kyang 'tshal// 'phags pa myi 'pham 'gon po la// mu tom cal col brjod pa 'di// bstod pa'i sems su dmyigs mod kyi// brjod dngos spad par 'gyus
124b7(mdo): byas dgas// sems kyis bza kyi rgyan dbyigs kyang // bltam sa kyi zug dang ba sa// ji ltang bdag gis khyod ba stod pa// la la de 'dra gyung dgang // gdong 'gra cug bcwas phyin pa mapa// dkon mchog gas
124b8(mdo): la dmyigs pa dang // yon tan rgya mtsho bdod pa las// rdul tsam 'ga' zhig bden gyur da na// bsod nams 'gro ba kun la bad pa// byams pa la bstod pa theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// 
125a1(mdo): rgya kar skad tu/ bud dan ma tri phan ca sho ma tu pan \u0f7f shag ta/ bod skad du// sangs rgyas kyi mtshan lnga stong bzhi brgya lnga bcu rtsa gsum pa// 
125a2(mdo): sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpal thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma myed pa'i nam mkha'i dpal gyi rgyal po myi mtshungs pa'i spyan yon tan shi dang tu bzang
125a3(mdo): ba'i dpal gyi 'od// me tog pad mo le ru r+ya'i 'od zer sku gzugs rin chen dri mchog dam pa 'di mthong ba// gtsug gto skyon 'tshams mchog brgya nad pa// nyi zla grangs myed pa bzhin du sdang ba// smon lam
125a4(mdo): gyis rab tu brgya nad pas sprul da pa/ sha ni tu mang ba// chos kyi/ dbyings las byung ba/ chags pa myed pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sbyin 'tshams nyi ma bzhin
125a5(mdo): 'bar ba// rin chen zla ba me tog pad mo gser stug po lta bu'i sku rnam par snang bas thogs pa byed pa'i spyan mang po phyogs bcu da ther gyis khyam par mdzad cing/ 'jig rten gi khams thams cad du
125a6(mdo): snang ba dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yangam bu'i gling gi tshul phra mo snyed kyi wa lang pa chen po 'khor ba las mtshan tsam 'dzidapa pas ma lus pa 'dad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
125a7(mdo): snying rje'i 'od ches rgya mtsho'i 'od zer snyed sgrogs pa'i dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ri bo chos kyi dbyings phyogs kun tu gsal bapa 'bar ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
125a8(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho'i 'od sgrogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan grags pa myi mtshungs pa yi rnam par tha dad pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshes
125b1(mdo): pa chos kyi sprin gyi grong khyer 'od mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos nam mkha' gyen du 'byung ba dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo 'od 'bar gyi rgyal po la phyag
125b2(mdo): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes ri bo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi smon dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
125b3(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes skar mda' snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos rgya mtsho ston pa'i dbyings kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos 'od zer ri bo dpal gyi rgyal po la byag
125b4(mdo): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yi dbang dpal snying gi rgyas po la phyag 'tshalar lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes gtsug kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes seng ge dpal gyi
125b5(mdo): rgyal mtshan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu swA pa'i nyi ma'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbyings ye shes grob khyer mar me'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhi
125b6(mdo): gshegs pa chos kyi zla ba ye shes kun tu gsal ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa/ chos thams cad rgya mtsho las byub ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs thams cad kyi mar me'i rgyal po// 
125b7(mdo): la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa grags chen chos kyi rgya mtsho shugs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs su chos 'od zer 'bar pa 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tsha lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od kyi dkyil
125b8(mdo): 'khor rtse mo'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin bzhin sgrogs pa grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu snang bar mdzad pa'i dpal gyi snying po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshalo// 
126a1(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa kun turnam par snang ba'i dpal ring ba rgyal pos phyag 'tshal lo// de cazhi na gshegs pa rnam mkhal bzhin sa chags pa mnas dpa' rgyam ma can gyi rgyas pos phyag sa/ 
126a2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa ye zhes kya chen po rgyas pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od zing kun tu kha 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgyad kyi gdugs dbyangs kyi rgyal po sa
126a3(mdo): phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po brtsegs pa rnam par bsgrags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klog ki mar me dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yun
126a4(mdo): ba mtha' yas shi nad tu bral ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin da gshegs pa dge ba rab tu grag pa gter gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dam pa'i chos skyod dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag
126a5(mdo): 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi gzhal byed khang sgrogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal // de bzhin gshegs pa byo/ sa thams cad kyi mar me'i rgyal po sna phyag 'tshal lo// de ban+de
126a6(mdo): gshegs pa ye shes rin chen kun tu 'bar ba'i dpal gyi yan tan dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'angam bu'i gsepa sadangs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi lam pa
126a7(mdo): lo ya dngas 'bam pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par sngam pa'i dpal snying po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa na ces bzang dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin
126a8(mdo): gshegs pa me tog dri thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// / de bzhin gshegs pa me tog thams cad kyi dri dbang phyug gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa klu li dbang phyug kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal
126b1(mdo): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa zhi ba 'od gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin stong dbyangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad sgrogs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 
126b2(mdo): de bzhin gshegs pa rin cen 'od zer ri bo dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang ba'i dpal mdangs kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi zla ba 'od kyi rgyal po sa phyag 'tshal
126b3(mdo): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kun tu 'bar pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma'i gzi brjid dpal gyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan khor yug ri'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal/ 
126b4(mdo): lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can kun la snang ba'i rgyal po la phyaka 'tshal lo// / de bzhin gshegs pa chos dbang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin dpal rgyal po la phyaka 'tshal lo// de bzhi
126b5(mdo): gshegs pa 'od mang po'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gnen/ pa rnas par spel ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhis gshe gas pa gzhas kyis kyi nub pa'i rgyal mtshan rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/
