337a4(mdo): myod pa bas rnam par grol ba'i phung po thob pa dang / dge/ dpa'i yon tan thams cad chos kyi dkon mchog go zhes bya bar de lta bu yang ma yin te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dge ba'i yon
337a5(mdo): tan dang bsod nams kyi dbang gis myi lus thob pa yin no// chos dang bral na myi myed la/ myi las gud na yang chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya ba ka la yod// dang 'dir gleng ba
337a6(mdo): na myo dang chos su gcig tu mthun la sa dad pa yang yod de chos kyi dbang gis myir myi 'gyur/ mya'i dbang du chomo 'gro bas/ de'i phyir rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / stobs bcu dang / myi 'jigs
337a7(mdo): ba bzhi dang / mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad bcu dang / pha rol tu phyi nid pa las stsogs te/ ting nge 'dzin grangs myed pa yang sangs rgyas dkon mchog tu bshad do/ 
337a8(mdo): nyan thos kyi rnam par grol ba'i phung po ni dge 'dun dkon mchog tu bshad do// yon tan 'di rnams 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs dang gtan tshigs su dmyigs pa'i
337b1(mdo): sbyor ba ni/ chos kyi dkon mchog ces bya'o// yi ge ni dbyings gcig te/ don gnyis su bshad kyis kyang / chos kyi dbyings la sangs rgyas dang dge 'dun tha dad pa yang yod de/ de yang
337b2(mdo): chos kyi dkon mchog tu bsdu'o// de ltar rnam pa gsum d+ha bshad nas/ sems can gyi skyabs dang / rte nad du bya na khams gsum na 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las tha rad par 'gyur ro// spyod pa
337b3(mdo): thams cad kyis sdug bsngal sbom po las tha rad kyis kyang / sdug bsngal phra mo ma zad do// de'i phyir yang dag pa'i mthar phyind pa'i dkon mchog gsum bshad par bya'o// sngon bshad pa la sangs
337b4(mdo): rgyas la sdug bsngal mnga'o// chos ni myi rtag go/ dge/ 'dun yang myi rtag ste/ sdug bsngal ma yini pas/ yang dag pa'i rten gnas ma yin zhes zer na/ deng 'dir bshad pa na
337b5(mdo): rtag tu gnas pa ste/ rnal 'byor da pyod pa rnams kyis chos nyid stong pa nyid du mngon par chud cing / byin ci / brgyad dang bral ba skye 'gag myed pa yang dag pa'i rten gnas su
337b6(mdo): gyu ra pa de ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog ces bya'o// rtag pa'i chos rnyed do cag dmyigs pa'i mthar da phyind par spyod pa ni yid du ga pa'i dkon mchog ces bya'o// myong ba rnams kyis yang dag/ 
337b7(mdo): ba'i chos kyi chos nyid khong du chud cing / rtag tu 'dus ma byas pa'i gnas su grub pa ni dge 'dun zhes bya'o// yang phyin ci log brgyad du gtan du bral bas/ 'phags pa dang skye bo thams cad dang / 
337b8(mdo): mthud cing rnam du yang sdod pa myed pa ni dge 'dun dkon mchog ces bya'o// sngon dkon mchog gsum gyi mye dngochos su tha dad par bshadadapa 'di ba de sangs rgyas dngos po gcig la chos dang
338a1(mdo): dge 'dun yang der byung bas don de'i phyir ngas khyod la das blo gcig pa'i dkon mchog gsum bshad de/ skye bo kun theg pa gcig tu phyogs par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub
338a2(mdo): sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis 'di skad ces gsosod to// bcom ldan 'das gapas rnam par rtog pa ste/ theg pa chen po bskul par bgyid/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dang/ 
338a3(mdo): rigs kyi bu khams gsum myi rtag par bsams te/ theg pa chen por sgrub bo// byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid dad kyis/ ge sa sa pa/ ji ltar na myi rtag pa la rnam par rtog par bkyil/ 
338a4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa med pa/ myi rtag pa la darnam par rtog par bya na nyon mongs pa rnam par spangs te// yang dag pa'i dran pa mngon tu bzhaka la/ byams pa
338a5(mdo): dang snying rje thog mar 'gro bar bya ste/ skye bo rnams la chos bshad cing bskal na yang / lan myi re ba ni byang chub sems da pa la zhes bya'o// de la sems can yongs su myi gtong ste/ theg
338a6(mdo): ba chen po bsgrub par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dper na/ grong khyer chen po gcig 'khor brgyad dpag tshad gcig la sgo mang po zhig yod pa der 'gro na lam dag yang sa dang / mun nag dang / shin tu
338a7(mdo): 'jigs pa'i sa cher yod kyis kyang krong khyer der phyin na/ shin tu bde skyid par 'gyur bas/ skyes bu myi gcig la bu cig pu zhig yod pa shin tu yang stug mod kyi/ grong khyer de na bde skyed pa
338a8(mdo): longs spyod dpag tu myed pa yod do zhes thos pas/ bu sdug pa der bor nas/ grong khyer der 'gro 'dod pa'i phyir thabs sna tshogs kyisi lam 'jigs sa rgal nas grong khyer de'i sgor bya nid pa/ 
338b1(mdo): dang / rkang pa sa cig tu nang du bcug ste/ rkang pa ya cig ma bteg pa'i bar du bu de dran nas 'di ltar bsams so// bdag la bu gcig pu yod pa bdag chas pa'i khar dzi ste ma khrid da su zhig
338b2(mdo): srad nas gso'o zhig ku zhes bsams nas/ grong khyer de btang ste/ slar bu'i thad du chas so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i byams pa dang / snying rje yang de dang 'dra ste/ byams
338b3(mdo): snying brtse ba'i phyir mngon par shes pa lnga bsgom par bya'o// bsgoms te zag bzang na yang 'grub pa myi yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sems can la snying bsgo ba'i phyir/ zag pa zad pa dang mngon
338b4(mdo): bar shes pa spangs te/ so so'i skye bo'i ser 'grod par bya'o// rigs kyi bu dper na grong khyer bde'i skyid pa zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par tha dad pa chen po la bya'o// dpe' sgom
338b5(mdo): bo zhes bya ba ni/ ting nge 'dzind kyi sgo brgyad khri bzhite/ pa la bya'o// dper lam 'jigs sa chen po zhes bya ba ni/ bdud dang babyegs lta bu la bya'o// dper grong khyer gyi
338b6(mdo): na sbyin ces bya ba ni mthod par shes pa lnga thob pa la bya'o// dper rkang pa sa cig bteg ste/ thel pa'i nang du 'jug pa na li zhes la bya'o// dper rkang po la cig sa btog pa
338b7(mdo): byung chu ba sems dpa' gzhan nam pa ma grol pa la bya'o// dper bu gcig du lus shes bya ba ni yis rgyud lnga masems can sa bya'o// dpeng bu sa drun ladi snyi rje chen pol bya'o// nu/ 
338b8(mdo): 'azed du ldog pa ni/ sems can 'dus zhing rnam par grol ba thob pa la bya'o// dper lan dang 'grub pa len pa ni thabs mkhas pa la bya'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
339a1(mdo): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa dang / bsnying rje chen pos smras te gyi gtong ba ni bsam gyis myi khyab po// rigs kyi bu yang 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' skyes bu dam pa
339a2(mdo): dang po sems dang po'i bskyed pa nas/ byang chub kyi snying po la zug gi badra dru ga/ sems can la rtag tu dge' ba bcu dpog par bya'o// bcu po gang zhe na/ srog myi gcod pa dang / ma byind par myi le nad pa dang
339a3(mdo): 'dod pas log pa myi g.yem pa/ rdzun du myi smra ba dang / 'phra ma dben gyi byed pa dang / ngag rtsub po myi smra ba dang / don byed pa'i gtam tshig myil pa myi smra ba dang / brnab sems kyi byed pa dang / gnod
339a4(mdo): sems myi byed pa dang / log par myi blta ba ste/ byang chub sem sa dpa' de bzhin du byams pa dang / snying rje chen phun sum/ 'tshogs par spyad na/ byams pas ni dge' 'ang stond cing / 
339a5(mdo): bde bar dkod par byed/ snying rjes ni sdug bsngal las tha rad pa dang / dmyal ba las bsgral bar byed do// skye bo rnams mya ngan las 'dab sgrub par 'dod pa'i sgom shes pa mthong na
339a6(mdo): byang chub sems dpa'as skye bo de lag la snying rje ba'i cho sems bsgom par bya'o// snying rje'i dbang gis sems can thams cad mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo 'byed pas bde ba'i gnas mngon par ston
339a7(mdo): theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu thob par byed pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyed pa spyod pa zhes bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' mtshan nyid tha dang
339a8(mdo): kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i ngan pa zhes bgyi ba kang / bka' stsald pa/ myi skye myi 'gag pa'i chos spyad pa'o// gsold pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos bya
339b1(mdo): kyi skye ba ni kang / myi 'gag pa ni yang / bka' stsald pa/ rigs kyi bu sdig pa'i chos ni gyi skye bar bya/ dge' ba'i chos ni gyi 'gag par bya'o// de lta bu spyod pa khams gsum du spyad pa ni ga 'dod pa
339b2(mdo): rnam pa lnga'i bag chags kyi dri mas gos par gyi 'gyur ro// rigs kyi khams gsuM bkod cing sems can bsgral bar 'dod na// chos rnam pa bcu po 'dis khams gsum du bgrod par bya ste/ kun rdzob kyi
339b3(mdo): tshig dang yi ge'i tshag ya ki rjes su khams gsum yod par bshad mod kyi/ bla na myed pa'i byang chub ni dus gsum du myi gnas la// mthar da phyi nad pa'i byang chub rnam grangs su myi blta na/ dus gsum dpa
339b4(mdo): gsum lta zhig ci smra'o// chos bcu po gang zhe na/ bstod pa dang smad pa la sems skye bri myed pa dang / snyan dang myi snyan par thos pa la/ sems rnam par myi rtog pa dang / shes rab can dang
339b5(mdo): gti mug can 'dra bar snying rje skyed pa dang / sems can bla 'og gang yang rung ste/ snyoms par blta ba dang / mchod pa sras ma gus la sems rnam pa gnyis su myi 'byed pa dang / gzhan ni
339b6(mdo): nyes skyon la 'phyas myi 'dog pa dang / theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs su mthong na yang / theg pa gcig tu blta ba dang / ngan song gsum ki sgra thos pa la 'jigs pa dang / skrag pa'i sems mya skyed pa dang / 
339b7(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'dra bar blta ba dang / skal pa snyigs ma tsan gi dus su sangs rgyas 'byung ba la ro mtshar rmad tu 'byung ba'i 'du shes skyed pa dang bcu ste
339b8(mdo): chos bcu po de dag dang ldan na/ byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kyis nyod mongs par myi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' skyes gradas pa/ khams gsum da bgrod pa'i
340a1(mdo): snying rje chen pos gzhi byas nas/ mnol ba'i zhing der 'od 'dres kyang rtul myi ka cig ste/ de bas na bsam khyab dka' zhes bya'o// kang zhig 'jig rten rnam dag na// bskal da pa gcig gi
340a2(mdo): bar dag tu/ tshul khrims dam du srung du srung ba ni/ skyes bu de ni skad cig dka' ba tsam// byams pa spyad pa dam pa mchog/ gang zhig 'jig rten sa 'di ru/ lus dang ngaka yid sdig spyad de// ngan song
340a3(mdo): gsum du lhung nges kyang / bya bas sems de yis 'phral tu 'bya / byang chub sems dpa' 'ag zhig gis/ 'jig rten nang par skyes na yang / 'jigs dang dogs pa ma skyed cig/ ngan song
340a4(mdo): ltung ba'i sdig yod kyang / 'go bon pa tsam gyis 'byang / ga zhig 'chi ba gcod 'dod dam/ nyon mongs sgrib pa swa pa 'ong ba/ 'jig rten ngan 'dir skyes na yang / dam chos sru
340a5(mdo): shes rab 'phel// rnam dag zhing du bskal pa 'bum// tshul khrims rnam dag spyad pa bas/ deng nas sa pa de'i bdag tu/ 'jig rten 'di ni gnas kyang bla// de ni ci'i phyir zhe na// ngas
340a6(mdo): ni gyi 'khrug 'jig rten dang / bde ba can gi 'jig rten gnyis/ shi nad tu rnam dag mthong ba na// sdug bsngal bya ba'i myings 'gyed/ khams gsum de ru bsod nams kya/ dka' ba snyam du shrI
340a7(mdo): mdzad de/ gang kas 'jig rten 'di dag tu// rang kis myi bzod bzod bya ste// pha rol po yang bzod gzhug ma// de ni bzod nam pa mchog/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams
340a8(mdo): 'jig rten napa 'dir bgrod pa'i tshe/ nyon mo ngas mya ngan ma khyed par// sems can thams cad 'dren bya ste// brtson 'grus brtan pa'i sems bskyed na// bla myed byang chub snyems
340b1(mdo): de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol da to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rnams kyis/ rang 'dir byang chub sems dpa'i byang / 
340b2(mdo): chub kyi rgyu dang rkyen zhig zhu zhing mchis da/ de bzhin gshegs pa skabs dbye bar kanang na/ spobs pa skyed de zhu bar bgyi'o// zhes gsol pa dang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal dab// legs
340b3(mdo): kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma la dge' ba'i rdza ba rnams bskyed pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa la mkhas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyir/ byang chub spyod pa'i brtson pa
340b4(mdo): 'grus brtan 'dril legs kyis/ 'dod pa bzhin dris shi/ de ngas khyod la bye brag byed par bshad do// bcom ldana'angs kyis skabs skye bar gnas nas bcom ldan 'das la/ nam
340b5(mdo): mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gos lang ti/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'as ci bgyis na/ brtul zhugs dang dka' thub kyi sems la ma mchis par 'gyur/ byang chub sem
340b6(mdo): dpa' sa ci gabyim na/ nges pa'i tshig sa 'gyod pa mamachimi 'ang 'argyas byang chub sems dpa' sa ci bgyis da rtsa ba 'phes par 'gyur/ byabachub sems dpas kyi bgyi / 'jigs pa/ 
340b7(mdo): mchis shi ma gyi gapa' bar 'gyur/ byang cab sems dpas ci 'dzi na/ dbu pa'i chos yongs su 'gyub 'ang 'gyur/ mam sems dpa' che / cig gnas
340b8(mdo): bama'i bar tu legs par 'tshas dpar 'gyul/ byang chub sems dpa' sa kyi bgyis na thabs pa zhin da tu mams par 'gyur/ bya bachub sems dpa 'am kyibagyis na/ sems can
341a1(mdo): ston pa bgyid par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpas yib kyis na che rabs su byang chub kyi sems chud kyi gson papa 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'as ci bgyis na// sems spyod pa rnam pa kacis
341a2(mdo): las rnam pa sna tshogs su spyod pa ma mchis par gyur // bya bachub sems dpa' sa kyi bgyis na chos rin po che legs par bsgrub par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' sa rtsi bgyis na/ tshul khrim pa dang 'dul na
341a3(mdo): las bcas pa'i kha na ma tho ba las 'byung bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'as ci ba gyis na/ nyon mongs pa rnams 'akag par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'as ci bgyis na// tshogs mang po kun dang // 
341a4(mdo): mthun par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'as ci bgyis na// chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo legs par 'byed par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'as ci ba gyis na/ sngon gi dbang gi mthus dge' ba'i rtsa ba
341a5(mdo): myi sto dra par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'as ci 'gyis na/ kan na gyis bstan dpal rag rmyi lus pa rang bzhin gyis pa rol tu phyi dad pa sdug spyod par 'gyur/ byang chub sems
341a6(mdo): dngas mi bgyis dang / bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzid btang ste/ 'dod pa'i khams su skye bar 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa' ma kyi 'byos na/ sangs rgyas kyi chom las phyir gyi ldog par 'gyur/ 
341a7(mdo): chub sems dpas ci bgyis na/ dge' ba'i rtsa ba dang / khams gsum du bgrod cing sems can la ston pa bgyid de/ sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid rgyun myi 'chad par 'gyur// / de nas bcom
341a8(mdo): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snyi po la legs so zhes bya ba byin te// khyod de bzhin gshegs pa la bya ba chub sems dpa'i bya ba rnams zhu ba zhus pa 'ang shin tu legs
341b1(mdo): so legs so// khyod legs par nyon la dran pa mngon tu zhog shika/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bka' bzhin du thos par smodad te/ mnyand cing mnos papa 'tshal lo zhes gsol ba dang / bcom
341b2(mdo): ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' dam mkha'i snyi po la bka' stsal da pa/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'as chos bzhi dang ldan na rtul zhugs dpe/ dka' thub kyi sems myi gdung bar 'gyur
341b3(mdo): chos bzhi gang zhen ka sems can thams cad la snying rje bskyed pa dang / brtson 'grus bskyed cing le lo myed pa dang / skye shi'i 'khor ba rmyi lam tsam dang 'dra bar shes pa dang / yang dag pa'i yid kyis sangs rgyas
341b4(mdo): kyi ye shes bsam pa dang bzhi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dang ldan na// dka' thub dang brtul zhugs kyi sems gtu pa myed par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sa yang chos
341b5(mdo): bzhi dang ldan na// nges pa'i tsha ki la bar ma dor 'gyod par myi 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ nges pa'i tshig chos la bdag myed par mngon par chud ces brjod ces brjod pa dang
341b6(mdo): nges pa'i tshig skye gnas so cog la dad pa'i 'du shes skyed pa kyi rigs shes brjod pa dang / nges pa'i tshig gis theg pa chen po la rgyu nad tu bsngags pa dang / nges pa'i tshig las dge' sdig gis 'bras
341b7(mdo): bu myi rtag ces brjod pa dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa yang chos bzhi dang ldan dge' ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ tshul khrims srung ba dang / mang du thos
341b8(mdo): pa dang / sbyin pa byin pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 'jig pa myed cing tshul las myi g.yo' bar 'gyur ro// bzhig zhe na/ khye stong
342a1(mdo): pa dang / kyi snyan la grags pa dang / smad cing spa dbab pa dang / zug bsngal gyis non kyang myi gsol bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa yang chos ba'i dang ldan na/ chos dkar tsho yongs su khyab par
342a2(mdo): 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rom po las dge' sdig yid ches pa stond pa dang / sbyin pa la lan gyi ra ba dang / dam pa'i chos la srung zhing skyod pa dang / shes rab chen pos byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
342a3(mdo): la ston par byed pa dang bzhi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sa yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sa gcig nas sa bcu'i bar legs par 'gyur ro// chos bzhi gang zhe na/ dge' ba'i rtsa ba yun du skyed
342a4(mdo): pa dang / nyes skyon thams cad sel pa dang / zabs la zhi nad tu mkhasra ba dang / dga' ba'i rtsa ba brtson 'grus ci spyad pa byang chub tu sngo ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa yang chos bzhi dang / 
342a5(mdo): ldan na/ thabs la shi nad tu mkhas par 'gyur ro// bzhin zhe/ na/ sems can gyi yid dang mthun par byed pa dang / gzhan gi bsod nams dang yon tan la rjes su yi rang ba'i seMs/ 
342a6(mdo): bskyed pa dang / sdig yod na 'gyod tshangs bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / ma chos kyi 'khor lo sko par gsol pagadab pa bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa yang chos pa'i
342a7(mdo): dang yang ldan na/ sems can gyi stond pa byed par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ rtag tu sems can la phan pa dang / bde ba bsgrub par byed pa dang / rang gi dka' ba yongs su 'dor ba dang / nyes
342a8(mdo): byas te// bzod pa bsgom pa dang / le lo ba spang ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshe rabs tshe rabs su byang chub kyi sems chud myi rnam par 'gyur rngon
342b1(mdo): gang zhe na/ phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la rtag tu dran par byed pa dang / bsod nams byas so cog/ sems can gyi phyir bla na myed pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba dang / dge' ba'i bshes gnyen la sten pa dang // 
342b2(mdo): theg pa chen po yongs su bsgrag par byed pa dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sems spyod pa rnam pa gcig las rnam pa sna tshogs su myi spyad par 'gyur ro// bzhi ka bzhin
342b3(mdo): nyan thos kyi sems spapa' dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sems spang ba dang // chos sgrub pas skyo mya nges pa dang / chos kyi thos pa gzhan la bsnyad par byed pa dang / bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa chos
342b4(mdo): bzhi dang ldan na// chos rin po che legs par bsgrub par 'gyur ro// / bzhi kang zhe na/ theg pa chen po chos dkon na'i phyir rin po che dang 'dra bar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen po'i
342b5(mdo): chos sems kyi nad thams cad sel pa'i phyir/ sman dang 'dra bar blta ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos nam yang myi drag pa'i phyir/ nor kyi dbyig dang 'dra bar lta ba dang / theg pa chen po'i chos mya
342b6(mdo): ngan las 'ad bar byed pa'i phyir/ sdug bsngal 'azhig par blta pa dang ba'i 'o// byang chub sems dpas yang chos bzhi dang ldan pa/ tshul khrims nyabs pa dang / nyon mongs pa'i kham pa tshob dang
342b7(mdo): byung bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ chos rnams 'ong ba myed pa'i phyir/ chos la gyi skye ba'i bzod pa dang / chos rnams song ba byed pa'i phyir/ chos la myi bzod pa'i bzod pa thob par
342b8(mdo): chos rnams rgyu dang rkyend las skye bar shes pa'i phyir// chos la brtend cing 'breld par 'byung ba'i bzod pa dang thob pa dang / tha dad pa'i sems rgyud myed pa'i phyir// myi gnas pa'i bzod par
343a1(mdo): bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpas yang chos bzhi dang / ldan na/ nyon mongs pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur ro// bzhi keng zhe na/ yang dag pa'i dran pa mngon tu bzhag
343a2(mdo): dang / dbang po rnams ma bsdams pa dang / dge ba'i chos kyi stobs bskyed nus pa dang / byang pa'i gnas su dad cing 'du 'di spangs pa dang bya ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpas
343a3(mdo): yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ tshogs mang po kun dang mthun par 'gyur ro// ni gang zhin/ bdag sa pa smrab na yang khyad par thob par gyi sgrub pa dang / le lo myed par rtag tu bkang ste dang / 
343a4(mdo): gus pa'i sems bskyed pa dang / chos kyi phan pa 'azla zhig chos kyi bdag sbyor ba dang / gzhan dag la dag pa'i chos pa sta nad kyang / rnyed pa dang bkur sti dang / grags pa myi
343a5(mdo): tshol ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpas yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ chos kyi sbyin pa'i sgo legs par 'byed par 'gyuraro// bzhi gang zhen dam pa'i chos yongs su srung zhing skyo
343a6(mdo): ba dang / rang gi shes rab la phan par byed cing gzhan la bstan par byed pa dang / rtag tu ya rlabs kyi chos pyod pa dang / rnam par ma dag pa'i chos la rtog pa dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa'as
343a7(mdo): yang chos bzhi dang ldan da/ sngon gyi dbang gi mthus dge ba'i ma ba myo bdag par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ pha rol pe'i nyis skyon la dbang myol pa dang / zhe sdang can la rtag tu byam sems sgo
343a8(mdo): ba dang / rtag tu chos thams cad rten 'brel du 'ashad pa dang / bran byed pa 'bying rgyag la rtag tu dran par bya ba dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpas yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ gzhan gyis
343b1(mdo): bstan da pa la rag ma lus par rang bzhin gyis pha rol tu phyi dad pa drug bya bar 'gyur ro// bzhag zhe na/ rtag tu chos kyi sbyin pas gzhan la byin pa dang / gzhan gyi kha na ma tho ba myi brjod
343b2(mdo): ba dang / chos kyis bsdus te/ sems can gyi stond pa la mkhas pa dang / chos zab mo la chub par byed pa dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpas yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ bsam gtan dang
343b3(mdo): ting nge 'dzin btang ste/ 'dod pa'i khams su mngon tu skye bar 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhe na/ sems mnyen des su bya ba dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu rnyed par bya ba dang / sems can thams cad
343b4(mdo): myi gtong ba dang / shes rab dang thabs mkhas pa'i mthu stobs rgyun tu bsgom pa dang bzhi'o// byang chub sems dpa' sa yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos las phyir myi ldog par
343b5(mdo): 'gyur ro// chos bzhi gang zhe na/ skye shi'i 'khor ba grangs mye nga bar myong na yang / skyo bo'i sems mya bskyed pa dang / rtag tu sangs rgyas tshad myed pa la mchod pa bya ba dang / 
343b6(mdo): byams sems tshan myed pa bsgom pa bya ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chad myed pa la mos pa bskyed pa dang bzhi'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpas yang chos bzhi dang ldan na/ 
343b7(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rgyun gyi 'chad par 'gyur ro// bzhi gang zhen/ sems can thams cad kyi phyir smod lam mya gtong ba dang / sbyin pa'i khyod lam la dad pa dang brtson 'grus chen po ma
343b8(mdo): 'dun pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos la sems zab mo rgyun tu myang ba dang bzhi ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum du bgrod cing myod pa rnam pa bzhi bani sa gra
344a1(mdo): su rgyad / thams can la pad+ma pa dang zad par byas shing / 'jig rten las 'tha' ba sgoms na/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid rgyun gyi 'chad par 'gyur ro// de'i mi theg pa med mo
344a2(mdo): sa rnam pa bzhi bzhi bshad pa na/ lha bzhi khrini blan myed pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// myo las nyi khri lnga stong na chos la myi skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo// byang chub sems dpal ban
344a3(mdo): khri brgyad stong na chos kyi khams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyind pa thob ste/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mngon par khong du chud do// de'i tshe de'i dus na yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dang
344a4(mdo): sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka sa med te// rigs kyi bu khyod mdo'i sde 'di legs par zung shig/ chongs shog ces bka' stsalang nas
344a5(mdo): byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces kaso lad to// bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di myong dza le ka sa/ ci ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das
344a6(mdo): kyis bka' stsal da pa/ mdo sde 'di'i myang ni the rad ba chen po phyogs su rgyas pa bdud kyi yul 'jom pa/ mu stegs kyi dpung dang bcas pa bshig pa nyon mongs pa thams cad sel ba
344a7(mdo): log par lta ba dang / 'dod pa rnam pa lnga'i 'ching la 'grel ba/ khams gsum gyi btson ra dral ba/ 'khor ba las tha da cing mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs su bskul pa/ sa bon dam
344a8(mdo): ba'i rgyu skams pa la rlan par byed pa rgyu rkyen chen po pha rol tu phyi nid pa drug gi chos kyi char pa ba ba/ sems can theg pa gsum gyi myid dang me tog rgyas shing 'phel bar byed pa byang chub kyi
344b1(mdo): 'bras bu mchog theg pa gcig tu 'grub par byed pa zhes bya bar zung shig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpal nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces ka so la to// bcom
344b2(mdo): ldan 'das la bdag sngon 'das pa'i sangs rgyas grangs ma mchis pa'i spyang dang / 'dus pa grangs ma mchis pa dang / tsho gas dpag tu ma mchis pa'i nang du chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang
344b3(mdo): don rnam pa sna tshogs dang / mtshan ma rnam pa sna tshogs dang / theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyang thos na/ ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos de lta bu dang / ngo mtshar mang du byung ba'i don de lta bu dang / 
344b4(mdo): ngamatshar rmad du 'byung ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu dang / de mtshar ma du byung ba'i theg pa chen po do lta bu na thos ma myong ste/ deng zos pa 'di dag bdag rgyuni myi 'chad par bgyi'o// 
344b5(mdo): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag la/ chos dang dge 'dun ni 'gag par myi 'gyur te/ khams gsu ma gyi sems can rang skye zhing rang 'gags par gyur nas
344b6(mdo): de bzhini gshegs pa ma mthong ba dang / chos dang dge 'dun yang ma mthong bas mya ngan las 'das te/ 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes brjod do// bdag cag de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin rnams
344b7(mdo): kyis khams gsum du bgrod tsa dris so skye ba'i rjes su stegs te mya ngan las 'da'o zhes tha dgas su brjod pa sags so// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das ma
344b8(mdo): srad na/ bdag cag rnams kyimi theg po brgyad khris sangs rgyas kyi ye shes su chud par skyes bu ched po chos kyi sku thob par kyi'o// / chos kyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems cad rnamapa
345a1(mdo): mdo sde 'di sel ba bkyi'o// gzung zhing 'chang ba dang / zag pa dang / kha ton tu 'don par bgyi'o// ji ga bshad ma ldan na tham ste/ dus gcig tu sangs rgyas grub par
345a2(mdo): bgyi'o// myi gtong bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la las bcom ldan 'das mya ngan 'das pa'i slad na snyigs ma tshan gyis dus su mdo sde 'di gzungs
345a3(mdo): su bzung zhing klog gam/ kha ton tu bgyid dam/ glegs bam du yi ge pa 'dri 'am/ yi ger 'drir 'jug na/ bsod nams ci tsam zhig thob par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bkal stsal
345a4(mdo): bya/ rigs kyi bu gang las las stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ nor bu rini po ches yongs su bkang ste/ sbyin pa byin pas mdo sde 'di glegs 'am
345a5(mdo): du byas te/ 'chang ba tsam gyis bsod nams dpag tu myed pa che'o// gang la las 'jig rten gyi stong khams phrag pa cung nor bu rin po ches yongs su bkang ste/ sbyin pa byin
345a6(mdo): babs/ mdo sde 'di glegs bam du byas te/ 'chang ba tsam gyis bsod nams dpag tu myed par che'o// gang la las phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams khams su nor bu rin po chos yong
345a7(mdo): su bkang ste/ sbyin pa byin pa bas/ theg pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo sde 'di'i nas nas yi ge gcig gam shu lo ka gcig 'dri 'am/ 'drir 'jug na de bas kyang bsod nams dpag tu
345a8(mdo): myed par che'o// 'jig rten grangs myed pa'i khams su rin po ches yongs su bkang ste/ sbyin pa byin pa bas kyang // sems thag pa ba nas mdo sde 'od la shu log gcig 'dra'am/ 'dir
345b1(mdo): kha ton du byas na bsod nas de bas kyang dpag tu myed par che'o// stong khams yongs su gang ba'i sems can gyi srog gi skye bas byind pa pas/ gang giso sems thag pa nas mdo sde 'di
345b2(mdo): 'idon tshag gcig cig shes te/ gzhan la tshag gcig ga ma/ shu log gcig gi don bstan na/ bsod nams de bas dpag tu myed par che'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ zang zing gi sbyin pa ni
345b3(mdo): nyan thos kyi sbyin pa yin te/ tshe dang longs spyod bskyed par zad kyi 'khor ba las myi zar ro// theg pa chen po'i chos kyi sbyin pa ni/ sems can rnams kyi byang chub kyi rtsa bskyed pa dang
345b4(mdo): theg pa gsum gyi ye shes kyi srog sdud par byed pa'o// rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di klog pa dang / 'chang ba ni sngon sdigacan ma rungs pa yin na yang de dge ba dang ldan pa'o// 
345b5(mdo): sngon sdug bsngal can yin na yang / da longs spyod dang ldan pa'o// sngon 'ching ba can yin na yang dgrol thar de te dang ldan pa'o// sngon ma rgal ba yin na yang / dargal ba
345b6(mdo): can no// sngon blun po zhag yin na yang / da ni slob dpon du chud pa'o// sngon zag pa dang bcas pa zhig yin na yang / da ni zag pa myed pa'o// sngon so so skye bo'i spyod pa can zhig yin
345b7(mdo): nayang / de ni'i phags pa'i gyod pa dang ldan pa'o// sngon sa lam dang 'gal ba zhig yin na yang nga ni 'phags pa'i sem la chud pa'o// mu sa skye bo'i lus can yin na yang / 
345b8(mdo): mdol sde 'di klog pa dang / 'chang ba'i phyir blo na 'phags pa'i ye shes dang 'dra ba'o// sngon nyin mongs pa can zhig yi med sang / da mdo sde 'di klo ko ba dang / 'chang ba'i byoras ngas
346a1(mdo): rgyam bcom ldan 'das 'dras mya ngan las 'dasaca na// zhes bka' bral dab dang / byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' snying pos 'di skad ces nam yad to// / 
346a2(mdo): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas bshad bstar na/ sngon mo sa skye bo logs kyang da ni 'phags pa'i rtsod lam dang ldan pa'o zhes bkyi ba dang / nad mangs pa cam lanas na yang na
346a3(mdo): mede sde 'dimig nga bas langs rgyas na 'das dang 'du ba mya ngan las 'das bcad do// zhes byang namyal mam sa zhes pa dang / mams pa byed/ 
346a4(mdo): pa dang / dam pa'i chos la bskur ba btab pa yang marnam sde 'di klog pa tsam gyis nyon mongs pa spong ste/ mya ngan las 'das pa dang mthun pa zhig lags sam/ 
346a5(mdo): don de rig par dka' zhing mchis na bcom ldan 'das bye brag phyed par bstand tu gsol zhes zhus pa dang / bco ma ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa legs so legs
346a6(mdo): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis legs par zhus pas/ ngas kyang legs par bshad par bya'o// rigs kyi bu sems can thams cad sangs rgyas ma mthong ba'i phyir/ log par lta ba
346a7(mdo): dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dang / dam pa'i chos la bskur ba btab pa yin no// sangs rgya 'jig rten du bzhugs pa na/ tshul khrims nyams pa dang / dam pa'i chos la bsku
346a8(mdo): ba btab pa yod myed do// de'i lta zhe na/ dper tra ma myi gcig la bu gcig pu zhig yod pa de shin tu yang 'bangs shing sdug na/ pha yod pa'i che na ni nyini mtshan du bstand ci
346b1(mdo): bslabs pas byas so cag la 'gal ba myed do// bu yang pha la sri zhu che ste/ pha'i ngag nyan cing nyes pa yod ma byung ngo // re shig dus gcig na/ pha la ma ring por 'gron du song ba
346b2(mdo): las/ ring du lon te skar ma 'khor ba'i bar du/ bu de pa'i bstan ngag brjed nas nyes pa'ang mang du byung ngo // pha rol tu lon te slar ma 'khor ba'i byor pa shi ba skad du brjod de/ drang mo dag
346b3(mdo): byed cing khad kyis 'tshal du byed do// mya ngan gyis non cing sems stor nas/ pa'i bstand pa yang brjed de chos la bskur ba btab pa dang / 'dra bar 'gal ba she dag byed do// pa de rgyun ring po
346b4(mdo): zhig lon nas dus gcig na slar khyim d+hu log pa'i che/ bu ya sha nad tu dka' ba dang tshim pa skyes nas sngon pa'i bstan dag kyang dran te/ gzungs su bzung nas nyes pa 'ang ma
346b5(mdo): byung ngo // pha mthong ba'i phyir pa ma shi bar yang yid ches na sa log par ltung ba can zhes kyang myi bya'o// pha'i bka bzhin du myi 'gal bar spyad pas skur ba can zhes kyang mya bye ste/ 
346b6(mdo): rigs kyi bu dram zhes bya ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'o// bu gcig bu zhes bya ba ni sems can thams cad do// bas bstan cing bslabs shes bya ba ni tshul khrims so lam ring por song zhes bya
346b7(mdo): ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa khams gzhan du chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gshegs pa'o// pha ma mthong zhes bya ba ni che 'das so zhes brjod pa'o// mya ngan gyis non pa ni sgrib pas bsgribs
346b8(mdo): ba'o// gzungs su myi 'dzind pa ni phyir tshul khrims zhig pa'o// shi ba skad brjod pa'i phyir sdig pa spyod pa'o// don 'khrul pa'i phyir bskur ba btab pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pas
347a1(mdo): khams gzhan nas slar gshegs te/ sems can gyis mthong ba ni sangs rgyas mya ngan las myi 'da' bar yid ches pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan nas sems kyi rang bzhin
347a2(mdo): slar rnyed pas tshul khrims myi nyams bya'o// mya ngan las myi 'da' bar shes pa ni ltung ba myong ba'o// bstand pa dang / myi 'gal bar pyod cing don shes pa ni chos la myi bskur ba yin no// 
347a3(mdo): rigs kyi bri mdol sde 'di klog pa/ dang / 'chang ba ni 'khor ba grangs myed pa'i nyon mongs pasdig lnga ba kun 'byung bar 'gyur ro// kar mdo'i sde 'ang thos pa ni sangs rgyas kyi mtshan thos pa'o// 
347a4(mdo): gang bdo sde 'di mthong banasangs rgyas kyi zhal mtho dang ba'o// kang mdo sde 'di 'dzind pa'o na sangs rgyas kyi sku 'dzind pa'o// gang mdo sde 'di myod pa de dag ni sangs rgyas
347a5(mdo): kyi mdzad pa spyod pa'o// ka mdo sde 'di myed pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bshad pa'o// gang mdo sde 'ad na shes pa ni dag ni/ sangs rgyas kyi don gas pa'o// ka
347a6(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa myad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi do legs par grol ba de ni nyon mongs pa gtan myed par 'gyur ba'o// de ci'i byor zhe na/ mdo sde 'di lag tu 'ongs pa'i phyir nyon mongs
347a7(mdo): pa yongs su spang bar 'gyur ba'o// rigs kyi bskal pa brgyad khrel nyin zhag gcig tu brtsi bzhag sum bcu zla ba gcigazla ba bcu gnyis la lo gcig tu bsgres pa'i bskal pa brgyas dbye ba
347a8(mdo): khrag khrag 'das pa la sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang 'phrad do// yang bskal pa grangs de dang / 'dra ba 'das nas sangs rgyas gcig 'byung ba dang 'phrad kyang / mdo sde 'ang dang bran
347b1(mdo): pa shi nad tu dkon no// kar mdo sde 'di dang 'phrad pa ni phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'phrang pa dang 'dra'o// de'i phyir blo dang ldan pas mdo sde 'di blang ba dang / 'chang / 
347b2(mdo): ba dang / klog pa dang / kha ton tu bya ba dang / yi ger 'dri ba dang / 'drir 'jug pa dang / gzhan la yang bstan na log par lta ba dang / ma rig pa'i nyon mongs pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa'i
347b3(mdo): sdig pa yongs su 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsod nams kyi zhing la gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten gyi mchod yon dpag tu myed pa yang 'ju bar 'gyur ro// nam mkha'i snying pos gsol pa/ 
347b4(mdo): bcom ldan 'das rang sangs rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi yon de/ 'ju ba skad myi gda' na/ so so skye bo lta zhig yon 'du bar 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
347b5(mdo): rang sangs rgyas kyi yon mya 'adz+hamya srad de/ sems can la tshim bshad cing bsgral mya nus na yang bsam gtan dang tang nge 'dzind 'jug pas ting nge 'dzind la langs te/ rdza
347b6(mdo): 'phrul chen po rnam par spyaspyad cing nga / sems rnams bsgral bar byed par mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad
347b7(mdo): nes gso lad to// bcom ldan 'das mdo sde kha cig las byung ba lta ba log pa dang / tshul khrims zhig pa rnams khams gcig tu lhan cig gnas su yang myi rung ba dang / chu klung gcig/ 
347b8(mdo): la chab 'tshal tu yang myi rung ba dang / gso'i sbyong gi tshe gang zag de 'phags kha'i lam stor ba lags te/ dge 'dun gyi nang du yang myi chud ces byung na/ ji'i slad du/ deng 'dir tshul khrims
348a1(mdo): zhig pa rnams kyang mchod yon 'bru bar 'gyur zhes gsungs// gal te de dag mchod yon 'ju bar 'gyur na ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa dang yang tha myi dad la/ 'phags pa dgra bcom pa dang / 
348a2(mdo): rang sangs rgyas 'da' ba 'dra na/ bcom ldan 'das de tsam zhig bye brag byed par bshad par spodang/ bdag kyang thos nas de bzhin du sems can rnams la bstand par bgyi'o// rnam par grol
348a3(mdo): bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying pos la bka' stsald pa/ legs so legs so rigs kyi bu khyed la stsogs pa deng 'dir byams pa dang snying rje
348a4(mdo): phun sum tshogs padrung ldan pas/ sems can rnamasad la sgying rje bar bsams te/ dod de zhu ba ni rab tu legs te/ ngas kyang bye brag byed par bshad kyis legs
348a5(mdo): par sems la nyon cig/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i khyod dul ni nyan thos dang rang byang chub rnams kyi ma rig par yang myi 'gyur la/ bdud dang mu stegs dang / so so skye bo rnams
348a6(mdo): kyi bsam pa'i gnas kyang ma yin te/ ngan sangs rgyas mkhyend pa dang khyod kyi khong du chud bar zad do// rigs kyi bu ngas rtag tu byang chub tu sems bskyed pa rnams la bstand pa/ sems can par
348a7(mdo): ngan rnam par myi rtog par sbyin pa byas na/ bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su 'grub po zhes bshad de byol so la sbyin pa byin pas ni bsod nams kyi yon tan brgya thob par 'gyur/ log pyod
348a8(mdo): khya sbyin pa byin pas ni bsod nams kyi yon tan stong thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa brgyun chad pa ni ni 'phos na log khyod kyi rgyud tu 'gro'o// drin gyi khe zo ba dang khrel byed pa ni
348b1(mdo): 'chi 'phos na byol song gi rgyud du 'gro'o// log bapyod kyi 'bras bu rnam par sbyind pa yang bsod nams kyi yon 'ardzun mdo sde 'di klog pa dang / 'chang ba'i gang zag lta zhig ci smos/ de bas na
348b2(mdo): theg pa chen po'i mdo'i sde tha rad pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mthul dang byin gyi brlabs bsam gyis myi khyab bo// / tshul khrims 'jig pa dang / mtshams myed par 'gro ba dang / dpa kha'i cho
348b3(mdo): la bskur ba dang / log par lta ba dang / nyon mongs pa can gyi sdig pa yongs su 'byang bar byed pas na mchod yon yopa 'ju bar nus so// bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'
348b4(mdo): snying pos gso yod pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin ka gas pa'ang bsam gyis myi khyab tha dad pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'i mthu' dang byin gyi brla'as bsam gyis myi khyab
348b5(mdo): mdo sde 'dzin pa dang / klog pa'i gang zag de'i yon tan yang bsam gyis myi khyab bo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal da pa/ de de bzhin no// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te
348b6(mdo): khyod kyis bshad pa bzhin te/ yon tan bsam gyis myi khyab pa mtha' yas pa thob par 'gyur ro// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' snying po la 'di skad ces
348b7(mdo): bka' stsa la to// ngas dran pa sngon 'das pa'i bskal pa rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba nang de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dgu bcu rtsa gnyis la mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas na yang
348b8(mdo): nyan thos kyi tshul gyi tshul du spyod pas nyes skyon mang du byung ba dang / tshul khrims nyams pa dpag tu myed pa dag/ 'byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis kyang nga la lung bstand pa
349a1(mdo): ma gyur to// bskal ba de 'das nas/ bskal pa mthong bar mo sra ba zhes bya ba na nga de'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi bcu la mchod pa phul te/ bsnyen bkur byas na
349a2(mdo): sangs rgyas de dag gis pa la lung ma bstan de to// bskal pa de 'das nas yang bskal pa tshangs pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba na/ bde'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag nyi shu rtsa gnyis la mchod
349a3(mdo): pa phul te/ bsnyen bkur byas na yang / sangs rgyas de dag gis pa la lung ma bstand to// bskal pa de 'das nas yang bskal pa sems dga' zhes bya ba na/ bde'i tshe sangs rgyas
349a4(mdo): brgyad khri bzhi stong la mchod pa phul te/ bsnyen bkur bya sa na yang sangs rgyas de dag gis pa la yung ma mastan to// bskal da pa de 'das nas yang bskal da pa sdug bsngam
349a5(mdo): skyabs shes bya ba dang / 'jig rten rnam par brgya nad pa zhe sa bya ba na de bzhino gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag/ par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyend pa dang zhabs su ldan
349a6(mdo): bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyend pa/ skyes bu'i 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ bla na myed pa'i lha dang myi rnams kyi stonod pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa chen po zhes
349a7(mdo): bya ba byung ste/ bde'i tshe sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bzhi ba tshul mchod pa phul te bsnyen bkur byas nas/ gdod mdo sde 'di'i myong thos te/ nyon mongs pa yongs su spangs kyis kyang / mngon
349a8(mdo): sde 'di dung ma mthong ste/ nga de'i tshe de'i dus na/ mchod pa'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs bstsags te/ mchod pa phul na yang / de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyis kyang ngal lung bstan
349b1(mdo): bar ma gyurar to// rigs kyi bur sngon bskal ba de snyed du sangs rgyas de snyed du la mchod pa de snyed cig phul ba dang / bsnyen bkur dang / bstod pa byas nas/ nyon mongs pa rnam par ma spangs te/ 
349b2(mdo): nyan thos kyi sngo dang / tshul phun sum 'tshogs pas tshangs par spyad cing / sbyidan pa byin pa dang / tshul khrims bslabs pa dang / nga rgyal zhe sdang dang / gti mug spangs te/ sbyangs pa'i yon
349b3(mdo): tan myang ba dang / bzod pa dang byams pa'i sems dang / ji ltar zos pa bzhin brtson 'grus bshad pa dang / zos so cog thams cad myi brjed pa dang / 'du 'dzi spangs te dben pa la gnas
349b4(mdo): ba dang / bsam gtan dang ting nge 'dzin la 'jug pa dang / bsam gtan las byung na chos nyan pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton tu 'don pa dang / bsam pa las stsogs pa dang / 
349b5(mdo): byas kyang / rgyal ba de dag gis pa la lung ma bstand to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sdom pa nos so cog 'jigs pa dang nyams pa mang du byung ba'i phyir ro// nyan thos dang rang
349b6(mdo): sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la chags pa'i phyir ro// theg pa chen po'i mdo sde tha rang pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa ma thos pa'i phyir ro// de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
349b7(mdo): kyis/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam spang bar bya/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde tha dad pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa bsgom par bya na/ lung bstand pa thob par 'gyur ro// gal te/ 
349b8(mdo): ngas bskal pa gcig nas bskal pa gcig gi bar du sangs rgyas kyi mtshan bshad pa na/ yang rdzogs par myi nus te/ rigs kyi bu dal bskal da pa de dag 'das pa'i 'og tu de bzhin
350a1(mdo): gshegs pa 'od myi 'gyur gyis tshogs chen po dpag tu myed pa la/ theg pa chen po'i mdo sde tha rad pa chen po phyogs su rgyas pa'ichos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa de thom
350a2(mdo): nas/ bde'i tshe de'i dus nA ka dod thos pa dang / mthong bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po de las langs te/ 'dzind pa dang / klog pa dang / kha ton bya ba dang / don bsam pa las stsogs pa bya
350a3(mdo): na/ de ma thag chos la myi skye ba'i bzod pa thob bo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'od myi 'gyur gyis pa la lung bstand pa/ khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
350a4(mdo): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shag kye thub pa zhes bya bar gyur ro// zhes lung bstand to// de bas na rigs kyi bu chos kyi rnams grangs 'di blags te/ 'chang ba dang / 
350a5(mdo): klog pa la stsogs pa byas na/ sangs rgyas kyi sra yang myur thob par 'gyur na/ 'jig rten na lha dang myar bcas pa'i mchod yon 'du bar 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ rigs kyi bu
350a6(mdo): de'i phyir ngas theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mthu stobs rin po che'i snying po dang 'dra ba/ bsam gyis myi khyab pa'i tshul khrims 'jig pa dang dbul 'phongs pa rnams kyi rdul dang / rin po che rnam
350a7(mdo): shu sbyin par byed pa la bstand pa'i tshigs su bcad pa brjod par bya'o// thog chen dpe'i tshad rgya mtshol bzhin/ theg brgya du pa rjes rgya// theg chen dpa' chad ri rab lhun// zag pa chu du grog mo'i
350a8(mdo): mkhar// theg chen dpe' tshad nyi zla bzhini// theg pa chu du me stag tsam// theg pa 'di ni theg chen yin// bsam gyis myi khyab theg pa'o// dper na nam mkha' dang 'dra ba// sems can thams
350b1(mdo): cad go 'byed do// theg pa thams cad kun gyi nang // theg pa 'di las 'da' ba myed// theg pa chen po 'di nang nas// theg pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung // dpag pa'i grangs shig yod na ni// thos
350b2(mdo): cad ma bsgral bar myi nus so// theg pa bla na myed pa 'di// sems can yongs su bsgral myi nus// nam mkha' 'dra ba'i theg chen la// gang gis dpag myed 'di myod pa// nam mkha' dpag
350b3(mdo): tu myed pa bzhin// gzugs dang dbyi bas kyang yong myed do// theg pa chen po de bzhin to// thogs pa myed cing dpag tu myed// sems can thams cad de dag kun// theg pa chen po do zhon
350b4(mdo): thaka pa'i mtshan la rnam rtog na// gtos rgya che zhing mang du sho8/ gal te theg chen yon tan dang // theg pa gcig tu myo da pa ni// bskal pa dpag myed rab bshad kyang // 
350b5(mdo): rgya rdzogs pam yong myi nus// theg pa thams cad kun gyi nang / theg pa chen po rnam pa mchog/ sems thag theg chen de zangs na// byang chub shing drung mngon par 'gro'o// 'chi
350b6(mdo): ba myed cing pogs mya pa// blan myed pa'i theg pa 'di// theg pa dman pa'i mchog 'gyur bas// byang chub dkyil tu 'dug par 'ong // rkyen 'brel bcu gnyis rnam brtags te// sems can la
350b7(mdo): rnams la snying bzo'i phyir// phyogs bcu'i sems can thams cad la// theg chen mdo sde bshad par bya// gang zhig theg chen theg pa ni// 'brel ba yam 'grib pa yod byed do// nam ma
350b8(mdo): bzhin du kun shong bas// theg pa chen po bsam myi khyab// de phyir sems can thams cad kyis// brtson 'grus su ni bsgom bya ste/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang ni// ye shes chen po
351a1(mdo): thob par bya// lha'i tshogs dang lha'i btud// mu stegs nyon mongs sel 'dod na// theg pa chen po skyabs song la// mngon shes drug dang ldan par byos// rig pa gsuM dang rnam thar
351a2(mdo): gsum// des ni btud dang mu stegs 'jos// log par lta ba yang bcil bas na// theg pa chen po mchog tu dgos// nyon mongs thams cad 'dzag pa dang // dge ba phun sum tshogs 'gyur ba/ 
351a3(mdo): theg chen mthu ni bsam myi khyab// de bas dpag pa'ang rab tu dka'// 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'i chos thams cad// slob dang myi slob de dag kun// theg pa chen por
351a4(mdo): kun 'dus so// sems can gang zhig ngan 'gror pyod pa ni/ log par lta ba dang ni sdig 'grogs bsten// gang zhig the ga pa chen por ma dad pa// des ni nyon mongs bdud rnams 'jom
351a5(mdo): mya nus// de rnams spangs te theg chen skyabs song ba// grol ra 'dod pas theg pa chen po slob// skyes bu gang zhog don de shes 'dod pas// theg chen bshad pa zos na dga' ba skye
351a6(mdo): de ni theg chen mya ni yin par mngon// zhi gnas sems ni mngon par shes dang ldan// de yang theg chen dbang gis rnam par brgyan// gang zhig theg pa chen por spyod nus na// de ni dkon mchog gsum
351a7(mdo): kyi rigs myi 'chad// gang zhig dkon mchog gsum la phyogs pa na// de ni bsod nams dpag myed thob pa'o// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams su phyind pa dang / phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dpag
351a8(mdo): byed mchod pa dang // de bzhin theg chen phyogs su rgyas pa'i mdo'o// mchod na 'jig rten mtheg pas thub pa byed// dpal dang gzi brjid 'bar zhing 'khor ba 'jom// de phyir theg pa chen po
351b1(mdo): bsam khyab dkal// byang gzugs stobs dang dbang phyug thob par 'gyur// phun sum tshogs ldan chos sku mngon par 'grub// gang zhig theg chen 'di la zhon pa ni// bla myed pa'i dga' ba myong ba
351b2(mdo): ni// lus kyi sbyin pas snying rje byams bsgoms na// de phyir theg pa bla myed thob par 'gyur// tshul khrims brtson 'grus tshangs par spyod pa ni// rdzu 'phrul mngon tu bsgrib kyang nus// de yang
351b3(mdo): theg chen myod pa'i dbang gis so// rang gi sems kyis brtson 'grus rgyun pyod pa'o// sdug bsngal non pa'i sgrib pa yod na yang // theg chen bsgoms pas de dag kun kyang 'byang // gang zhig theg
351b4(mdo): chen chos la bde'i gnas pa// de ni tshe dang long myod sangs rgyas debazhin// yang dag dran pa brtson par ldan pa ni// rdzul phrul rkang pa bzhi'i stobs kyang rnyed// dam chos yang dag don la
351b5(mdo): rten pa yang // theg pa chen po bsgom pa'i dbang gis so// rgya 'jigs dang ni stobs bcu ldan pa dang // mtshan bzang sum bcu rtsa gnyis brgyan pa dang // rdo rje ting 'dzin ye shes/ 
351b6(mdo): thams cad kyang // theg pa chen po bsgom pa'i dbang gis so// rigs kyi bu gang la las theg pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'odadi bzung ste/ 'bru gcig gam/ tshig gcog gam/ tshig bshad cig
351b7(mdo): 'chang ngam/ klog na bsod nams 'di lta bu dang ldan par 'gyur// gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ gang gis mdo sde 'di 'dzind pa// sdug bsngal kun dang yong bral lo// nam du yang ngan 'gror myi ltung
351b8(mdo): ste// bde ba'i gnas su phyinid par 'gyur// gang gis mdo sde 'di thos pa// phyi ma ma 'ongs dus ngan che// mtha' ru sangs rgyas grub par 'gyur// ras ni lung du bstand par bya// ga
352a1(mdo): kis rgyal la rtag gzhos pa// rnas pa'ang rtag tu de la gzhos// gang gis rgyam pa'i chos 'asrungs na// rgyal pa'ang de la bsrung bar 'gyur// rdzu 'phrul chen po thob pa dang / 
352a2(mdo): chos kyi 'khor lo po skor bar nus// 'khor ba'i rgyud las bsgral ba dang // bdud kyi dpung bcas 'jim yang nus// rgyal ba 'od myi 'gyur de las// ngas ni mdol sde 'di zos nas// bzod pa
352a3(mdo): gnas te lung bstand pa// shag kya thub ces bya bar sgrub// nga ni mya ngan 'das 'oko na// gang zhig mdo sde 'di 'chang ba// mngon par rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar// ngas kyang sung du bstan par bya/ 
352a4(mdo): gang gis ma 'ongs nus kyi tshe// mdo sde 'di'i dod shes te/ thun po rnams la rab bshad pa// dkon mchog gsum kyi rigs myi 'chad// sangs rgyas 'jig rten gyi bzhugs
352a5(mdo): kyang // mdo 'di 'jig rten gang na bar// gnas pa'i mchod gnas de dag tu// sangs rgyas mngon gsum bzhugs pa bzhin// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ngas sngon de bzhin gshegs
352a6(mdo): pa dpag tu myed pa las mdo sde 'di thos te 'chang ba dang / bskal pa 'jig pa'i tshe gzhan la rgya cher bshad pas na mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis kyang de ltar thob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang
352a7(mdo): chub sems dpa' nam mkha' snying pos 'di skad ces gsold to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis bshad// dang 'dir
352a8(mdo): yang bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis bshad na/ lus kyi rgyu gang gi dbang gis de dag 'grub par 'gyur ba// bcom ldan 'das kyis skabs dbye zhing bstan du gsold/ 
352b1(mdo): com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa sad pa/ rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa ni yon tan dpag tu myed pas bsgrubs pas mtshan sum bcu rtsa gnyis 'phrul pa yin te/ gal te ngas rgya cher bshad pa bskal
352b2(mdo): ba'i bar du yang bshad pa kyi rdzogs par/ de mdo tsam zhig khyod la bshad do// de dag gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sems zag pa nas tshul khrims dag par bsrung ba dang / yi dmal brtan pas 'azhabs shin

352b8(mdo): bar 'gyur ba dang / dge ba bcu bsgoms pas seng ge'i ro stod lta bu'i mtshan dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs te sems can la rtag tu bstod pas phrag so sha nad tu rgyas pa'i mtshan
353a1(mdo): dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / 'jigs pa rnams kyi mgon dang skyabs byas pas/ zag pa'i lhun shin tu mdzes par 'grub pa'i mtshon dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / gzhan gis myug lag khang ngam/

355b1(mdo): so cog thams cad yang dag par dngos po myed de/ yi ge yod pa'i phyir chos yod ces bshad chos kyi nang du yi ge myed la yi ge'i nang du yang chos myed do// kun tu spel ba'i phyir chos bstand to// yi ge'i nang du na/ 
355b2(mdo): byang chub myed/ byang chub kyi nang du ni yi ge yang myed mod kyi don dam par yi ge myed kyang / kun rdzob du yi ge yod par bshad pas/ sems can la sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid dang bla na myed pa'i byang chub yang yi ge/ 
355b3(mdo): las gud na myi rnyed do// rigs kyi bu khyod zer ba 'ang bden te/ de bzhin gshegs pa la zad pa myed/ skye ba myed/ myi sgom myi spyod/ skom spyod rnams dang bral ba/ yang dag pa'i chos la myi 'jug/ de las
355b4(mdo): ldog cing 'gyur ba yang ma yin/ skye ba gcig gis rga ldan gyi gnas dang su yang ma skyes/ de las babs te yum gyi lhums su yang ma gnas/ chos thams cad la sems myi gnas pas/ nga ni skyerga
355b5(mdo): na 'chi las 'das so zhes kyang ma byas/ phyogs bzhir gom bdun bdun yang ma bor/ nga ni 'jig rten na bla na myed pa'i btsun pa yin no zhes ma brjod/ grong khyer mchog tu na chung ma bzang
355b6(mdo): mo dang ma rtsen/ 'jig rten gyi bya ba yig rtsis la stsogs pa yang ma bslabs/ stobs dpa' phong rtsa la yang ma bsgri nang / sems can yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ rgan po mngon sum du bstan
